38816786.review:
TL;DR: There is no reason not to buy it sale or not.

I have conquered magical virginity, normal/bullock virginity, normal bullocks, phantom bullocks, screen cluttering money, a snowman, an e-girl streamer, and discount/donation boxes. I am the alpha male. 

A cheap fun arcade shooter; the best kind of time waster. Easy enough for anyone to pick it up and multiple difficulty settings on top of that.

Pros:
Cheap but well made
Easily accessable and enjoyable to a large audience
Multiple difficulties and modes
Fresh new game mechanics
[strike]not[/strike] naked girls
Good christian fun
I only ran into one insignificant bug (one of the minibosses upon spawning will instantly teleport to the other side of the screen for whatever reason)

Cons (All nitpicks really from a touhou player):

Special is way too easy to get. (Average 5 screen clears when reaching the boss for most stages) The screen clearer when used turns all bullets and non-boss enemies into more stars to re-fuel your special if used effectively.

Non-random enemy spawning (except mid-bosses) and power-ups. All enemies and powerups are scripted so they will always appear at the same time and location for each singular stage. (Each stage still has a different spawn pattern for enemies and powerups in case I worded that too confusingly.)

Not enough boss variety except for the Academy DLC bosses.

Not enough powerup variety.

Too easy.

Verdict: 7.8/10
Was very enjoyable. Most of the cons hardly subtract at all from the final score. Number mostly just shows my level of enjoyment all the way through. Buy it. It's only $2 for the game and $1 for the Academy DLC. Even if you don't like the style of game I'm sure a [spoiler]nude[/spoiler] patch is more than enough encouragement. High quality [strike]porn[/strike] game.

[h1] 脱力系脱衣シューティング [/h1]

ゲームとしては普通のシューティングなのだが、背景の女の子画像に（衣服を）破壊可能なスポットが設定されており、敵そっちのけであらぬ方向を射撃しまくることとなる。

リビドーの力とはげに恐ろしきもので、気が付くと「あれ、俺こんなにシューティング上手かったっけ？」という境地に達することであろう。

ある程度の服を破壊するとボス登場で、今度は弾幕を避けつつ下着を撃つという熱い展開が。
破壊完了前にボスを倒してしまうと面クリアなので、上手くボスに弾を当てないようにしなければならない。
なんなんだこれ。

自動射撃の「ワンハンドモード」があったり、クリア後の画面を勝手にキャプチャーして画像ファイルとして保存したり、全力でプレーヤーに寄り添う姿勢が実に潔い。

お手頃価格のギフト好適品だが、せいぜい冗談の分かる相手に留めておこう。

Ich habe jetzt 3 Stunden dieses Spiel gespielt und bin immer noch fasziniert davon, meinen Fap-Folder mit wirklicher anstrengung zu füllen. Es hat etwas herausforderndes, sich seine fap-vorlagen zu erkämpfen! 

Vor dem ersten Öffnen des Spiels rate ich jedoch jedem, im Spielordner (Steam/steamapps/common/Deep Space Waifu/Deep Space Waifu_Data) eine Textdatei zu erstellen und diese mit "nude.patch" zu benennen (ohne die Anführungszeichen). Mit dieser Textdatei könnt ihr nämlich die Mädels nicht nur ausziehen um am Ende zu sehen, dass man eigentlich nichts von den Dingen sieht, welche man nach erfolgreichen 2-3minuten im rumgeballere und enrage gehen hart erkämpft hat. Mit der Textdatei werden nette Dinge wie Nippel und Schamlippen sichtbar und man(n) hat ein viel, viel, viel besseres Spielerlebnis. 

Aber jetzt mal von den ganzen primären Zielen, welche definitiv die Kaufentscheidung beeinflussen.. Der Soundtrack von dem Spiel ist echt gut und auch ansonsten macht es mega viel spaß dieses Spiel zu spielen. Es hat zwar keine übermäßig lange Spielzeit und ich bin mir sicher, dass ich nicht in 2 Jahren noch auf meine erspielten Ergebnisse .. egal. Aber ich kann es wirklich nur empfehlen und bin mir sicher, dass das Spiel definitiv sein Geld wert ist (zumal es ja wirklich nicht viel kostet).

38374157.review:
DSW is quite a surprising game, as it's much better than one would expect. Of course, it's not the greatest SHMUP and can't compete with the likes of Cave, but neither does it need to nor would anyone expect that. However, it has pretty solid gameplay and is very fun to play, even aside from the erotic elements. What makes it rather unique (aside from an old hentai game called "Sentimental Shooting", which is very similar) is that it has two goals: One is defeating enemies, typical of the genre, which fuels your special meter and unlocks new levels, the other is destroying the clothing of the girls in the background, which... well, leaves them naked if you destroy it all. Often you have to decide on what to prefer and focusing on the clothes too much can easily leave you vulnerable. However, it's not a difficult game, albeit tricky at times, and even as a beginner it's not too hard to make good progress.

But of course, a big reason one plays this game are the eponymous waifus. It's quite apparent that the art isn't the best, but overall it's not that bad and some look pretty good, with few actual unappealing ones (in fact, at the time of this writing, one level with questionable art is getting overhauled to look MUCH better). All of them are designed with a specific concept in mind, like "nerd girl", "yandere" or "secretary", but as there's barely any dialogue, it's not that important and mainly just informs their looks.

And yes, there's an easy way to make them more "anatomical correct", without even having to download anything. Just create a file named "nude.patch" (it doesn't have to contain anything) in the "Deep Space Waifu_Data" folder and you're good to go.

The presentation, however, is unanimously good. It's very 80-inspired, which means lots of neon colors and a synthwave soundtrack (by Funny Death). And it's awesome. Especially the music makes the game considerably more enjoyable to play.

The overall mood of the game is also well done. DSW knows how utterly silly it is and revels in it. That's particularly apparent with the humorous and hashtag-laden introductions for the individual girls.

That all, coupled with a very low price, makes for a game with which you can't do much wrong.

38297850.review:
[h1]Direttore:[i]"Ok ragazzi, dobbiamo realizzare un nuovo shoot 'em up ma ci dobbiamo distinguere dalla massa, avete idee?"[/i]
Impiegato#1:[i]"Tanti tipi di nemici differenti, boss fight epiche!"[/i]
Impiegato#2:[i]"Una trama avvincente!"[/i]
Impiegato#3:[i]"TETTE![/i]
[/h1]

Probabilmente Deep Space Waifu è nato così. Si tratta di uno shoot 'em up con meccaniche semplici ma allo stesso tempo capaci di mettervi a dura prova in alcuni casi grazie al famoso bullet hell (anche se non siamo di certo ai livelli di Tohou Project o Ikaruga). Nel gioco interpretiamo Bear King, un orso umanoide che attraverso un'app simile a Tinder, decide di andare agli appuntamenti con le varie ragazze presenti nel gioco.

Solo che non sono appuntamenti "normali". In ogni appuntamento con una ragazza infatti dovremo fronteggiare ondate di nemici e miniboss. Il gioco si distingue grazie al fatto che nel livello è possibile fare a pezzi l'abbigliamento delle ragazze, spogliandole a poco a poco, fino a lasciarle in biancheria intima che però potrà essere solo distrutta durante la sfida contro il boss (che apparirà quando ci sarà troppa "intimità" in un appuntamento).

Ovviamente durante il livello potremo raccogliere i vari power up, e caricare una barra che ci permette di usare un'arma speciale a scelta (la classica bomba, il rallentamento temporale, ecc). Tutte meccaniche semplici e di certo non originali (eccetto la parte dove le ragazze si spogliano forse), eppure il gioco presenta anche un buon livello di difficoltà.

Parlando di livelli di difficoltà, oltre ai 3 livelli di difficoltà (che differiscono per la quantità di vite disponibili), esistono altre due modalità, la modalità one-hand che permette di giocare usando una sola mano con il fuoco automatico e la modalità Gentleman. Quest'ultima è quella che io definirei hardcore, perché in questo caso bisognerà fare attenzione a NON distruggere i vestiti delle ragazze. Danneggiare un vestito è Game Over e pertanto bisognerà fare attenzione al posizionamento. Fortunatamente i controlli qui sono precisi e fluidi, il che è davvero un'ottima cosa data la natura del gioco.

Ad accompagnare il tutto è presente una soundtrack anni '80 molto ben fatta e orecchiabile anche se purtroppo sono poche canzoni e quindi a lungo andare rischiano di essere ripetitive.
Graficamente lo stile è piacevole, i disegni sono decenti (eh sì, c'è anche la patch 18+) e a fine livello è possibile fare uno snapshot dell'appuntamento (che consiste in una foto della ragazza nuda con punteggi vari), oltre a mettere a disposizione vari wallpaper.

Purtroppo uno dei difetti è che a lungo andare il gioco rischia di essere ripetitivo, non c'è molta varietà nelle boss fight (vari boss vengono riciclati più volte), tuttavia se preso a piccole dosi, il gioco risulta comunque piacevole e in grado di intrattenere visto che ogni livello può essere finito in una manciata di minuti.

Concludendo è un gioco che consiglio agli appassionati di shoot'em up che però non disprezzano di certo il nudo, il gioco costa veramente poco, anche durante i saldi. Se siete degli appassionati hardcore di shoot'em up magari lo reputerete troppo facile (anche se comunque li invito a provare la modalità Gentleman) visto che il Bullet Hell nel gioco non è di certo assurdo, anzi.

Voto: 6.5

Probably my favourite shootemup game I've played, aside from Deathsmiles itself. :o  The menu art is nice, the music is nice, the girl art is super nice, there's a decent amount of challenge. (Though if you've beat Touhous on Normal then it won't give you too much to worry about) AND the gameplay itself is actually solid and legitimate!

It's also fairly customisable, you can choose what special attack, movement speed and difficulty level you want before each girl, which means challenge runs can totally be a thing if you're brave enough. The game even has some actual scoring strats, such as blowing up clothes/bombing at specific times.

All that, and it's literally cheaper than two tubes of Pringles! :O I've already gifted it to like seven people, and apart from one stick in the mud, the rest actually enjoyed it. This game gets Robin's full seal of approval.

38203691.review:
[b]Deep Space Waifu is one of those games that you start playing, and you have a hard time putting it down.  It's challenging without being frustrating, the two powerups in the original game (laser and rocket launcher) are both pretty respectable and  vary in effectiveness depending upon how you play.  The Academy DLC adds some new powerups (like heavy machine gun) but I prefer the good old laser.  The controls are tight, very straight forward, and easy to remember so there's no fumbling with the controller for this game.  Oh, don't have a controller?  I recommend getting one for this game - it'll make your life a whole lot easier.   The music is pretty good and downright catchy and you might gut find yourself nodding to the beat without even realizing you're doing it.

Speaking of beats...once you clear each girl, it unlocks the "one handed mode" so you have a free hand if you wish to ... let's just say, "play DSW as a 'twin stick shooter'" and leave it at that. 

A lot of people gripe about the quality of the art in this game, but I'm not going to go there because: 
1) Art is subjective and one man's Picaso is another man's rubbish and 
2) I personally can't even draw stick people very well, so I have no business commenting on the value of other people's artwork. 
 I will say that some of the girls do indeed look better than others, but even with real women, isn't that the case?

My only real gripe with Deep Space Waifu was that the DLC doesn't have achievements for clearing those girls.  It's not exactly a deal breaker, but it would've been nice to have the extra achievements to shoot for.

All in all, there's a a lot of entertainment here for the asking price of a paltry $2.  If you like anime, ecchi, shmups, or any combination of the three, grab this game - you'll have a blast.[/b]

Probably one of the most embaressing games in my steam library. And before you ask YES it was a gift.
Lots of people have writing joke reviews but not alot of serious ones for this game, i hope to fix that.


PRO'S:

* The soundtrack, while limited to a few songs, is both charming and relaxing with certain tracks, and cheerful and enjoyable with others.
* Artstyle is nice, especially with the focus on 80's retro styling and somewhat vaporwave-esque look. 
* Combat is simple but enjoyable. Shoot the badguy's, don't get shot, use power ups, shoot off the girls clothing. That's about it.

CON'S:
* While the soundtrack is good, it's kinda limited. There's only about 3 or so tracks in the levels total.
* The artstyle, while enjoyable, has a very heavy anime look for the girls, which can look kinda weird. (Where's their nose?!)
* The range in enemies is also limited. There's only only a handful of common enemies and about 3 bosses not including those specific to certain levels.
* ALL THE WAIFU'S ARE BORING AND BASIC AS FUCK! Other then perhaps two of the girls all of them look incredibly normal, i know the dev's were going for anime trops and stereotypes but c'mon guys have some originality! Appeal to a wider audience! How about some monster girls? Chubby chicks? Some TRAPS?! Some girls with ACTUAL DARK skin tones? Make it DLC if you want i would certainly pay for it.

Worth the buy?:
While the game does have flaws, and also, it's incredibly short, only taking about 2 or so hours to complete, i'd still say for the very low price it's worth buying. If you're willing to accept the shame that will surely come from owning this game of course. If you want a simple shoot em' up and wanna see some lewd anime girls, (Despite the fact there's an entire internet out there for that) give this game a try.

38037681.review:
Deep Space Waifu (DSW) es un sencillo juego de naves estilo bullet hell donde controlamos a un gato (?) que monta una moto voladora (??) y que se dedica a acabar con naves enemigas para desnudar a chicas de buen ver destruyendo sus ropas con los disparos de sus armas (¿¿??).

Definitivamente no hay que buscar una historia porque no la hay. DSW no es mas que un sencillo y entretenido juego que pone a prueba tus reflejos y de paso te alegra la vista con sus hermosas chicas de poca verguenza (parche anticensura mediante).
Como bullet hell tampoco es demasiado exigente, por lo que los adictos a este tipo de juegos lo encontrarán facil. La verdad es que es un juego bastante llevadero y cortito, con graficos simpaticos y musiquita agradable, para echar unos ratillos libres y poco mas.

Tiene bastantes fases, pero se pasan rapido, y los bosses aunque no son malos, son pocos y tampoco excesivamente dificiles. Y es que la mayor pega del juego es que hay poca variedad de enemigos y de powerups. Por su duración quizas tampoco necesita mas, pero si a lo mejor hubieran dado un poco mas de contenido y algun modo mas de juego de los que trae (el normal y uno donde no puedes romper la ropa de la chica y que hace todo mucho mas complicado), quizás hubiera dado para mas.

En definitiva, SDW es un juego simpático y ligero, recomendable si esta rebajado y si os gustan los juegos de naves y las chicas ligeras de ropa.

Valoración: 5/10

38029543.review:
A fun danmaku game that involves shredding off girls clothes. This is definattely a game you'd wanna play when no ones home with the headphones plugged in. 

The game have a very vaporwave a e s t h e t i c to it that I dig. The danmaku part is pretty fun, with the clothe shredding adding a layer of difficulty by wanting to shred every piece as fast as you can before the piece goes off screen. I've died many times trying to get a piece to shred off because of that. My main complaint is that I don't see an option to slow down the character and show their hitbox with a standout indicator, I think such an option is essential for danmaku. Sometimes the speed was a bit much for me, especially in boss battles  trying to fly away when a lasers coming while also avoid bullets. 

Most of the girls dont have any dialog outside of their phone status, and I liked when there was dialog with the characters during scenes, and found the "Thank you for buying!" characters fun to play for that, though I found having to play with money bullets a bit annoying since its hard for me to see bullets in front of me with how the money looks.

I'm not sure how i'd grade difficulty since I didn't find it very hard (5 star'd every girl in 3 hours, often without restarting or dieing)  but all my friends that watch me play danmaku have always said I'm good at it so maybe it's hard...? I think the money bullet stages can be hard, but thats more of an obscuring bullet issue, rather than natural difficulty

I guess another thing that needs some improvement on is the specials you can choose.The slow down time ability is essentially useless since it slows down time for everyone, I think it'd be more useful if you could move at normal speed while enemies and bullets are slowed down. Theres a speedrun weapon but I havm't touched it cause I'd rather have the safety net of having bombs. I think there should be some more bomb-esque specials with different effects and lengths(a bomb that stays longer than usual but has a narrower area for instance)

I think it's a pretty good game if you like danmaku, vaporwave, and anime tiddies.

37993273.review:
[h1]Сборник "Вайфу"[/h1]

Типа-скролл-шутер под именем "DEEP SPACE WAIFU", пусть и собран на концепции эротической игры на раздевание, геймплейно это всё же привычный скролл-шутер, коих что в 90-х, что сейчас в стиме - навалом.

Какую роль выполняет эротика?
Продавать игру. Ещё? Мотивировать играть дальше и проходить до конца.

Но вот что нужно сказать о самой игре - это, пожалуй, самый ПРИЯТНЫЙ в плане управления симулятор "медведя-пикапера на космо-байке". В других скролл-шутерах всё очень часто упирается в управление, которое откровенно сковывает ваши движение или создает настоящий bullet hell на экране (впрочем, здесь он иногда тоже возникает).

В нашей же DSW приятно всё, от визуального стиля и музыки, до звуков, описаний, диалогов и саундтрека. Просто ВСЁ на хорошем уровне. На самом деле видя игрушку за 60р (или ~20 при скидках) невольно хочется думать о том, что перед вами очередной кал подсунутый хз ради чего, но только не вашего удовольствия.
Облом. Здесь игра - удовольствие в чистом виде.

Она достаточно сложна и казуальна, поскольку чтобы пройти всё можно выбирать любой режим сложности (число воскрешений) и это ни на что не повлияет. Странность, правда, есть - лишь при самой низкой сложности почему-то можно управлять чисто мышкой, вместо клавы -.- Ну, это бред. Клава не столь отзывчива, когда нужно увернуться от летящей в вас ракетной очереди.
Есть всякие бонусы, пассивки и прочее, что даёт разнообразие игровому процессу.

Фича же игры (внезапно) - раздевание.
А точнее то, что вы отстреливаетесь от воинствующей орды всяких леталок, желающей вашей смерти, но вместе с этим пытаетесь расстрелять одежду на выбранной девушке, клочок за клочком постепенно и раздевая.
Именно на синергии того, что нужно пытаться успевать делать сразу две вещи геймплей и становится достаточно уникальным. Это прибавляет сложности, интереса и азарта!

[h1]Причины приобрести:[/h1]
[list][*] Хороший скролл-шутер. Один из лучших в стиме.
[*] Отзывчивое управление, доступные и понятные геймплейные фичи
[*] Приятное времяпрепровождение на пару часов
[*] Неплохой юмор (подстёб над типажами персонажей) и сами персонажи
[*] Более-менее терпимо нарисованные девушки. Стоит отметить, что есть DLC, добавляющее их ещё больше. Сие DLC не нужно для открытия всех ачив, сами вайфу оттуда отрисованы на 15% лучше, что приятно
[*] Лёгкие достижения. Достаточно пройти весь основной контент
[*] Стилистика под ретро + Шикарный саундтрек (который приобретается за цену больше игры xD)
[*] Fap-Fap ;3
[*] Cheap
[/list]

[h1]Оценка: [b]6.0+[/b][/h1]
[i]Этим бы разрабам да игру покрупнее сделать, даже если другого характера, раз даже столько бюджетный проект такого качества. Но пока что, как видится, они ещё только начинают набивать руку.[/i]

37890136.review:
Игра определенно заслуживает внимания.
Давно не играл в столь глубокую сторри дривен игру. Сюжет буквально цепляет вас за шары и не отпускает до самого конца. Ожидаёте неожиданных развязок в сюжете, и сносящих голову клифхенгеров. Действительно, достойный представитель своего жанра.
Графика игры поражает воображение. Буквально каждый милиметр игры был сделан с любовью. Эта игра Ведьмак 3 от мира аркадных шутеров. Я серьёзно.
В 2017 году не вышел ни один достойный шутер. Вульфенштайн погнался за политкоректностью и забыл о проработке мира, Тайтн фолл был приторен и ничем не удивлял, Прей являлся жалким отголоском игры 2006 года, которую даже не смог переплюнуть. Эта же игра СВЕЖАЙШИЙ тайтл который подаврит вам незабываемые 7 а то и все 20 часов очешуительного драйвового геймплея. 
Каждый выстрел, каждый звук просто великолепен. Вы буквально ощущаете отдачу с монитора. Про оркестровую музыку я уже молчу, Ханс Циммер написал лучший саундтрек в своей жизни. Такого уровня погружения в игру в этом году, да что уж там со времен TES III Morrowind небыло.
От меня определенно MAST HAVE сегодняшнего поколения консолей и пека. 10 из 10 на кончиках пальцев. А если без лишней скромности то и все 12 из 10. Рекомендую всем людям вне зависимости от  половой и рассовой принадлежности. Абсолютно каждый найдет в этой замечательной игре частичку себя. Мастерпис.....просто ШЕДЕВР!!!

Si tuviera que definir este juego en pocas palabras sería: Un Bullet Hell de la vieja escuela pero con Waifus de fondo, buen apartado sonoro y notálgico modo Retro, dificultad ajustable por la forma de jugar y no por aumento de daño o reducción de enemigos (Esto me parece un buen punto a comentar), en síntesis un juego entretenido para pasar el rato.

37754148.review:
Despues de haber acompletado el juego, sacado todos los logros y de que mi esposa me dijera que le daba asco y me habia convertido en eso que algun dia dije yo que nunca seria, puedo darles mi opinion sobre el juego.

Deep Space Waifu es un juego de navecitas y desparos donde debes ir desvistiendo a la waifu y derrotando al jefe final, hay una gran variedad de waifus (puedes elegir tu favorita) y hay humor donde pense que solo seria morbo. El juego lo recomiendo si es que lo encuentras con rebaja, ya que a pesar de ser divertido, en 3 horas o menos lo terminas todo (con todo y la expansion).

En cuanto la dificultad, pues el juego es facil sin caer en lo ridiculo, si te podra costar un poco en algun punto pero nada que no puedas resolver, hasta en eso los desarrolladores fueron considerados y nos dejan ver a las waifus peladas de manera facil; pero no, no te vayas, si crees que este juego no es para ti por lo "facil", los desarrolladores metieron un modo "hard" (por asi decirlo) donde SI te va a costar varios intentos pasar cada waifu, y tomando en cuenta de que son muchas, pues ahi si tendras varias horas hasta que lo acompletes.

Y bueno, si llegaron hasta aca, les dejare 2 recomendaciones como premio:
1. Juegalo con el patch de desnudez desde el principio 
2. Cuando tengas que rejugar a las waifus para sacar los logros, rejuegalas en "modo retro", ya que asi obtendras nuevas "recompensas".

Y bueno, en resumen el juego es bueno siempre y cuando mi esposa no se separe de mi, si lo hace entonces sera un juego que me salio bastante caro.

37746179.review: okay so to keep this review short im just gonna say i am a huge fan of old school retro games. namely galage, space invaders, etc. and i looked at this pretty skeptical thinking it was jsut another anime echii game (although i do like those too) but tbh even tho this game has the THIQQQEST plot and makes me wanna go burrow my face into a pile of big anime tiddie while giving them a raspberry the gameplay is actually fun. which sounds strange since most games like these only have good "art" going for them and thats it. this game is solid in both the "art" department and the gameplay department if you gonna buy it its very much worth. i even bought the dlc the same day and theres honestly no complaints that i have other than sometimes it can be a little too crazy on screen at times which makes it hard to judge where the bullets are but tbh you could just chalk that up to what a bullet hell is in itself so yea also althoug there are "nude" anime girls they dont actually show there nipples or anything which is a shame (possible patch similar to huniepop?). basically the only ppl i could see not liking this game are people who either hate bullet hells or the anime art style. but honestly the game isnt just an anime art style its also got a 80's cyberpunk thing going at times too similar to hotline miami. id recomend definitly worth a buy. id say this game is worth waaaaaay more than just a dollar at full price. especially since you get a ton of content and levels to play through on different difficulties with the hardest basically changing the gameplay completly.

37648985.review:
Non ci avrei speso una lira su 'sto gioco, davvero. "Sarà il solito ecchi del cazzo, fatto così per far ingrifare i peggio weeb" dicevo. Mi sbagliavo. DSW è sì in parte un ecchi, ma è un bullet hell (genere che non ho mai toccato, se non fosse per Metal Slug X e Touhou). Lo ammetto, ho comprato DSW solo per le donnine (andiamo, chi è che l'ha comprato per la sua componente bullet hell?) da bravo segaiolo quale siamo tutti noi, ammettetelo. Qualcuno si ricorda quegli arcade in cui dovevi ritagliare il livello per scoprire la ragazza, evitando i nemici? Ecco, DSW è quasi la stessa cosa: svestì la tipa (è il vostro obbiettivo principale, suvvia) e nel frattempo uccidi i nemici. Al contrario i quanto potreste pensare, il gioco è molto carino e abbastanza divertente alle difficoltà più elevate. Nonostante l'abbia provato per poco, completando alla difficoltà "Faster" (la prima ragazza) e "Gentleman" (la seconda) posso già definirmi soddisfatto dell'acquisto (l'ho pagati un misero euro, ed è migliore di molti titoli del greenlight venduti ad un prezzo uguale, se non maggiore). Purtroppo le tipe sono poche (solo 13) e per aggiungerne altre bisogna comprare il DLC (dal costo irrisorio anch'esso, solo un euro). Il gioco offre diversi livelli di difficoltà, dal più semplice (partendo con 8 vite e potendo muoversi e sparare con il solo ausilio del mouse) a quello più difficile (partendo con 3 vite e non potendo sgualcire i vestiti delle tipe, altrimenti si causerà un game over). I pad Xbox (sia 360 che One) sono completamente supportati, tuttavia io mi trovo meglio con tastiera e mouse, ma è una cosa mia, non posso farci niente. I disegni delle tipe sono il più delle volte ben fatti, ma alcuni sono disegnati in modo molto grezzo e si nota una differenza di stile abissale. La colonna sonora è buona, con quelle tracce v a p o r w a w e che ormai sono diventate una moda. Simpatici anche alcuni riferimenti nei profili delle tipe, presenti prima dell'inizio di ogni livello (e c'è anche una JoJo's referente WOW). Alla fine, DSW è un ottimo acquisto, soprattutto per il suo prezzo e per il suo gameplay, che consiglio anche ai neofiti del genere bullet hell.
VOTO: 8½/10

37405329.review:
Look, we're all adults here, this kind of thing is too easy to joke about, particularly about "playing the game with one hand", which is something the developer is clearly aware of, since there's a game mode that allows you to do exactly that.

But the thing is, this game is a pretty decent time-waster.  It's simple and fun enough to control and a neat way to spend a while if you're not sure what to play.  The game has you control a ship, attacking enemies that come from all directions and attack with different patterns.  Like in classic NES shooters, though, your ship cannot rotate, so you only shoot upwards.  You're free to move in any direction, though.

The "real" part of the gameplay, though, consists in shooting off parts of the clothes of the giant girl in the background.  You can only end a stage by beating the boss, but destroying all the clothes net you a couple of bonuses.  If you're not scared at the sight of the female body, you can give this game a try with no problem.

Interestingly enough, though, there is one mode that requires you to win a stage WITHOUT destroying the girl's clothes, which forces you to completely change your playstyle and it's a nice change of pace, not to mention a large spike in difficulty.

So yeah, if you're looking for a game that lets you unwind for a bit, hunt for easy achievements and you're not bothered by the subject give this one a try.

37404130.review: This is the best game I've ever played.

37390429.review:
Entirely unremarkable in terms of gameplay.  Pretty standard top down vertical shmup, with the caveat of priority targets with consistent health occassionally ducking in and out of range, and destroying them is what affects your end of stage ranking.

Music is pretty decent, all things considered.

Overall, I felt the game was a bit disappointing in that it has very little going on.  When I saw the store page, I was expectin g a lot more crass writing and libido-fueled silliness, but the presentation is overall very subdued.

I wouldn't say it's a bad game per se, but it just doesn't have enough going on to be really considered good, or even "So awful that it's funny".

If you REALLY like this artstyle, then go for it, but otherwise you can get better porn for free pretty much anywhere.

37130560.review:
[h1] 欲得其心，钻研补丁	[/h1]

进入游戏，看到unity这个logo时，我嘴上情不自禁地“啧”了一下。
引擎是好引擎，就是挂着着这个羊头做得太寒掺的游戏太多了（都是我喜加一的锅），所以给我的印象就是见到这个logo必须先做好心理准备......
但其实我的心里早有B数，所以Deep Space Waifu这个游戏的合集包在我心中击败了价格上更加便宜的盗〇系列、返〇、伊森〇〇的消失等等，混着界外魔神界狙击精英暗黑血统等等被我打包回库，然后steam动态里偏偏就给我挂上了这个游戏和其dlc的封面，我暗中购买的行为被众好友完全看到，简直是公开处刑。
抛开这些尴尬的伤心事，就游戏来说，DEEP SPACE WAIFU仅仅只能算有趣，有一些意料之中的创新，有一些意料之外的糟糕之处。

[u] 意料之中的弹幕游戏：	[/u]
DEEP SPACE WAIFU从本质上来说就是一款普通的弹幕游戏，但是自然是有一些改良的；游戏中玩家在面对层出不穷的敌机的同时，还必须对标记在少女们关键部位上的方块进行射击，伤害足够达到方块上的数值后，那个部位的丝麻棉织之物便会裂开脱落，自然是令人喜闻乐见；值得令人欣赏的一点是，这个设计让玩家在面对BOSS时，必须面临“绅士”和生命的艰难抉择——是躲开BOSS的弹幕明哲保身，还是忠于欲望，在关键部位的方块移走前将其社保？这是个必须保持的平衡。同时，有的时候由于玩家输出过猛，必须停止攻击BOSS机，耐心社保剩余方块后才能放心通关......除此之外，制作者对每个妹子的身份背景做了一定的叙述[spoiler] （有娘化的G胖）	[/spoiler]，加上游戏过程中某些妹子的表情是“动”的，而非简单的挂张图，社保后也有合理的“音效”（虽然都一样），玩家们的购买点被把握得很好，足以满足欲望和需求。

[u] 意料之外的糟糕之处：	[/u]
在观看商店预览时，我以为我能在DEEP SPACE WAIFU中体验到丰富的弹幕游戏要素，但是除了在满足玩家视觉需求上很下功夫以外，制作者却并没有在别的方面上心；敌机的种类单调，攻击方式单一，甚至多数关卡的敌机阵型和BOSS雷同，这导致在经过了新鲜期后，游戏玩起来极其无聊，通关成了一种机械性的操作[strike] 少年，要持久啊	[/strike]，如果能有更多的敌机类型和随机的阵型变化，说不定能让人有多次通关同一关的欲望。还有满屏的艳色调背景，很容易和敌机发射的子弹搅在一起，影响游戏体验。

如果你想充满热情地打打有趣的小游戏，顺便看看小黄图，这个游戏还是很精良的，但是要想从中体会到游戏的乐趣，可能你就要稍感失望了。现在想想库里的弹幕游戏，除了靠厨力和画风决胜败的，[spoiler] Super Killer Hornet: Resurrection	[/spoiler]其实也还不错，甚至它和这款DEEP SPACE WAIFU在创新方面是很相似的，都是通过不同方法分散玩家的注意力，[strike] 但是它没有小黄图	[/strike]，所以还是大佬们说得好啊，
[spoiler] 你给我看奶子，我就给你钱。	[/spoiler]
[spoiler] 你给我看〇，我就能没〇数。	[/spoiler]


P.S.评论区有去码方法，默默点赞未回复的人早已突破200。

37039903.review:
Despues de completar DEEP SPACE WAIFU al 100% (JURO QUE LO HICE POR LOS LOGROS) es hora de hacer un análisis.

Deep Space Waifu es un Bullet Hell en el que tienes que matar una cierta cantidad de enemigos + un boss y opcionalmente, romper la ropa de la chica (Pero claro, los caballeros no romperemos ni una sola prenda, verdad?) 

Al principio imaginé un juego pedorro hecho con game maker aburridisimo pero terminó siendo adictivo, es perfecto para empezar a jugar un bullet hell, de verdad. 

Realmente no hay mucho más que decir que digamos, el gameplay es bueno, la música tambien y historia no tiene asi tampoco es para tanto. Lo agarré en oferta a MENOS de un dólar (originalmente vale $1,99) en las ofertas del Black Friday de 2017. Si tienes un dinerito de más recomiendo agarrarte el juego, más que nada por la hermosa ost que tiene este juego.

Altamente recomendado ;)

36781185.review:
Es sieht so aus, als müsste ich mich wenigstens einmal im Jahr dazu bequemen, ein Review zu schreiben: Die Steam Awards Nominierung "zwingt" mich dazu! Also wenn ich schon etwas schreiben muss - und es scheint, als sei mir dieses verdammte Abzeichen so wichtig - dann am besten gleich zu dem Spiel in meinem Konto, bei dem ich im Moment am ehesten das Gefühl habe, ich sollte vielleicht etwas dazu sagen. Zumal ich mir nun auch noch eine eigene Kategorie speziell dafür ausgedacht habe: Die "Irgendwie peinlich, aber warum eigentlich?"-Kategorie nämlich. Womit wir direkt beim Thema wären: Ein paar Anime-Mädchen die Kleidung wegzuschießen scheint heikel, ganze Horden von Zombies niederzumähen dagegen offenbar nicht. Beides kann man natürlich kritisch sehen, wenn man will. Oder es eben bleiben lassen, ist ja nur ein Spiel, nicht wahr? Mit der realen Welt hat weder das eine noch das andere zu tun. Der "gefühlte" Unterschied zwischen erotischen Inhalten auf der einen und gewalttätigen Inhalten auf der anderen Seite ist aber offensichtlich nicht nur in meinem Kopf vorhanden, wie zahlreiche Reaktionen auf dieses Spiel eindrücklich beweisen.

Aber bevor das Ganze nun zu ernst wird: Deep Space Waifu ist definitv eine Empfehlung wert. Der Soundtrack ist top, die Grafik könnte besser sein, geht aber in Ordnung. Der "Witz" des Spiels ist natürlich das Ausziehen der Mädchen. Wohlgemerkt, nicht das Ergebnis dieses Vorgangs sondern der Vorgang selbst. Das macht nämlich echt Spaß. Auch wenn man eigentlich gar nichts von Anime-Mädchen hält, auch wenn man längst alle Errungenschaften hat, auch wenn man alles schon gesehen hat, was es da am Ende zu sehen gibt, es macht immer noch Spaß!

Also: Irgendwie peinlich, aber warum eigentlich? Es gibt einfach keinen Grund dafür. 

In diesem Sinne: Gut, dass "wir" darüber gesprochen haben.

残念なことにオールヌードにしても肝心な部分は最近のジャンプのように書き込まれておりませんのであしからず。下はいいとしてもせめてビーチクくらいは描き込んでおけや、こんちくしょｗ

絵柄が古いのはさておき、音楽もとっても古い！８０年代ダンステクノを聞いてるかのよう。でも逆にそれがカッコイイ！古い絵柄とマッチして全体の完成度を高めてやがる。そして大事なＳＴＧの部分も弾幕とはいかないまでも骨太でやりごたえが半端ねぇ。

敵機の相手と女の子の着衣の破壊とを同時に行わなきゃいけないので、大分忙しい。だたの脱衣系だと思って舐めてかかってはいけない。

面クリすると女の子のスクショもらえてタイトルに戻る。
そして星の数によって新しい女の子がアンロックされるという仕組み。

なので、おそらくエンディングという概念はないんじゃなかろうか。
女の子全員のスクショ求めて一心不乱にプレイ。それが終わって自己完結ながらもエンディングという形になるんだろう。

昨今の弾幕系STGに食傷気味な人におススメｗ

ちな、最初はあまり可愛いと思わなかった絵柄も慣れてくると大分愛おしくなってきます。

ということでヌードパッチも当ててみた。ていうかもうパッチ自体は本体に内包されていて、解除方法がちょっと変わった方法且つ簡単なんだけど。これを当てると肝心な部分がしっかりと描き込まれてます。これぞ脱衣系。

だからといって相当エロくなるはずもなく、古臭い絵柄なので可愛いエロスというか、のび太さんのエッチ！的なエロティシズムです、えぇ。

レトロモードは古臭い絵柄がさらに古臭くなるモード。
だが、こっちのオールヌードの方がエロいのは何故だろう？？
脳内で補完するという人間の性質のせいか？？

３時間ちょっとでノーマルモードとレトロモードの１００％スクショと実績全解除できました！
実績全解除したのってこのゲームが初めてなのでますますファンになりそう。

漢なら嫁を質に入れても買わなきゃいけないゲーム。
質に入れるほどの値段じゃないがな！

36405359.review:
Dank des einhändigen Spielmodus konnte ich mir die andere Hand vors Gesicht halten, um den psychischen Schaden, den ich durch dieses Spiel erlitt, in Grenzen zu halten...

Der Spieler bewegt ein laserstrahlen- und raketenschießendes Motorrad im 2D-Shoot´em up-Stil, während er diverse, meist stachelige Konstrukte zum Explodieren bringt.

Soweit so gut; vor geraumer Zeit konnte ich durchaus Spaß an solchen Spielen finden,
schließlich waren Games wie PixelShips echte Klassiker.
Nun aber wurde diesem altbekannten Genre ein ganz besonderes Feature hinzugefügt:
Mit den fahrzeugeigenen Waffen lassen sich nicht bloß gefährliche Gegner vernichten, sondern auch die verpixelten Pantsu unserer vorher selektierten Schönheit.

Mal abgesehen davon, dass die Grafik durch das Zusammenspiel von grellen Farben mit maximalen Kontrasten im Vordergrund und überskalierten Hintergrundbildern im Close-Up, selbst auf "beautiful" (1080p) eine echte Zumutung ist, werden hier meiner Meinung nach Genres kombiniert, die in keiner Weise miteinander harmonieren.

36391485.review:
"Deep Space Waifu" is a really basic shoot-em-up, and can be completed by solely using mouse controls (which I recommend). The designs of the girls go from really well made, to really off-putting (Like the girl who represents Steam and the "Streamer" girl). The DLC girls are also very well drawn and the subtle animations they have when playing a level are really good. 

In general, if you can get it for cheap, I recommend it. If you want an easy game to 100% I recommend it. Looking forward to see what Neko Climax releases next.

Side note: Running the game on max settings does put a little strain on a persons system. Could be the engine it was developed for not being well optimized  for CPU/GPU's (Unity?) So just play it on the second highest setting if you are on a gaming laptop.

クーポンもらったので存在を知った。基本的にこういったロリ萌えアニメは好きじゃないが、受け入れられないほどでもないので試しに購入。良い意味で裏切られた。

これは面白い。

というのも、シューターとしてはちゃんと作られていて、実際操作もスムースだし納得が行く難易度。そして本来そちらがメインだろうけど、女子の衣類を破壊して、シーンごとに過激になっている様は、やはり男性として生きている自分にとってはかなり興味深いものがあった。

他のシューターでは1面クリア出来ないへたくそが、1日で全ステージコンプリートし、実績もすべて解除できるという、なんとも形容し難いパワーをいただけて満足。男に生まれてよかったと思う。

特徴的なのが、自機のスピードとBOMBの種類を選べること。特にアナログスティックだと速すぎたため、1.0から0.8くらいにしたらちょうどよくなり、ミスもかなり減った。

細かい所はそれなりの作りなので我慢するとしても、ついつい時間がある時にプレイしたくなるゲームだ。

インストールフォルダにnude.patchというファイル（空のテキストファイルでOK）を置くと、完全な18禁にすることが出来る。プレイ動画をYouTubeなどにアップする際はモザイク処理など必要なので気をつけよう。

36271280.review:
Art seems to be a few low res pictures of very poor, amateurish art. 

Not much content wise.

Didn't see a lot of enemy variety so far, but they feel very uninspired, and the gameplay is very barebone. Clarity is sometimes questionable and the fact that you control the speed in the menu rather than in game is disappointing.

I expected a bullet hell but this seems to be a casual shmup with no difficulty whatsoever.

The soundtrack is rather bad to the point i was wondering if there is any music at all.

Story is non existent. I don't see what's the "story rich" tag about, as it's literally just some generic, cliché "dating site bios" for each girl and no interaction whatsoever. Absolute nothing else. I'm starting to wonder if the tags are a troll from the fanbase.

I have every reasons to put a thumb down here, considering how overrated the score is, but its one redeeming point is the price. 2€ for some dumb fun, i guess.

However maybe some of these aspects get better down the line, i really hope they will, so i'll modify the review accordingly if necessary.

But so far this is more like your generic 2 star NewGrounds flash game by a begginer rather than something worthy of being one of the highest rated steam games. I feel robbed, and i mainly blame the playerbase for that.

Might be worth the price tag, alas it is still worth 0/10 in the bigger picture.

So my question is... Why 98%?

36235120.review:
It's not too easy, it's not too hard. Deep Space Waifu adds an interesting erotic flair to a pretty basic (and fun) gameplay formula.
Just as HuniePop made Match 3 interesting with boobies, DSW makes your standard shoot-em-up (or as I like to call them, SHMUPS) all the more... engaging.

As for the Academy DLC, it more of the same mostly. A few different enemy types and bosses to cock block you, a new Heavy Machine Gun upgrade, and a handful of upstanding young women for you to respect.
From a gameplay perspective only two of the challenges from Academy really stood out as different:
The annoying c:GoldenU:nt of a cheerleader requires a bit of planning on the use of your specials, and the final trio of girls who have the most unique (albeit quite easy) boss.
Basically get it if you want more of the same... and why wouldn't you ;^)

Other Pros:
•69 achievements
•One-handed mode (for added comfor- I mean challenge)
•A nude patch that is literally just a text file named nude.patch

I give Deep Space Waifu a score of 8008 out of 10000.

this only bearly got a not recomended from me, and if its on sale go ahead and give it your buck fifty, but for me it doesnt really tickle my pickle and heres why.

first, the exact moment that prompted me to write this review:
i opened up a girl that i had played before after scrolling through the entire selection twice, and the game told me i had unlocked "one handed mode" and realized that whoever thinks that i am going to rub one out to the roughly 10% of the subpar hentai picture visible to me at any given moment while on my last of 8 lives and battling one of the same three bosses that ive been fighting for the last two hours is clearly having one over on me.


now for the pros and cons

pros:

1. anime tiddy

2. decent shoot-em-up gameplay backed by anime tiddy

3. a large selection of anime tiddy

4. an insanely easy to activate nude patch.

5. roughly $1.50 on sale including dlc

6. the fun tongue in cheek hentai humor that weve come to expect from a post hunie pop game.

cons:

1. the art style is really pretty subpar. i get that the artist had to draw a dozen different layers and whatever but frankly i could get better hentai with a bing search.

2. you die a rediculous number of times. its not really that the game is too hard (which it can be) but that everything is a one-hit-kill. the tinyest bullet and the largest deathray all have the same 100% kill rate.

3. i wanted to see unique bosses themed for each of the girls, and while there are a few (e.g. golden virginity) most of the girls share the same boss every time.

4. the soundtrack is meh.

5. the selection screen mimics tinder in that you swipe left to go to the next girl and swipe right to choose the girl you want to play, which is fun, but entirely prevents you from going back. so if you accidentaly pass by the girl you want to play, you have to swipe through two dozen girls to fix your mistake.

6. im 2.6 hours in and ive completed about 80% of the game already (including academy dlc)

overall if anime tiddy is your main motivator for this game, and you dont mind having to work for it, wait for a sale and give it a go, otherwise... meh.

36117783.review:
The discussion of games as art comes up a lot these days, I feel that it's incredibly important that we take a step back and realise that when something truly beautiful shows it's lovely self to the gaming community as a whole, we should appreciate it, admire it, and enjoy it to it's fullest extent. 

Deep Space Waifu is a top down bullet hell (Minor) space shooter that mixes elements of curtain fire shooting and classic strip the girl games like Gals Panic. The gameplay is intuitive and easy, and fun. Removing the erotic aspects of the game, it stands as a solid and enjoyable fun top down shmup with a lot of interesting bullet patterns and excellent music (The soundtrack is worth the cost, I recommend it fully) 

Games in this price range catering to this particular demographic tend to be lower in quality especially when it comes to music and artwork - but the girls are well designed and well drawn. They react to the action around them or the removal of an article of clothing with gasps or cute little yelps. The balance of dodging danmaku and ensuring that you drain the health on clothing articles is the real joy of this game. It provides an excellent amount of tension in what should be a throw away indie title given it's exceptional value in regard to it's price and DLC. 

The game returns to the title screen whenever you complete a stage, which allows you to just get a quick fix in if you're needing to relax and enjoy a little shoot-em-up action with a VERY attractive reward. The atmosphere and graphics mixed with the fantastic synthwave soundtrack, provide a meditative effect that truly allows the player to relax and enjoy themselves. 

There's also a one handed mode that enables auto-fire so you can handle other things. If you're into that sort of thing. There are also options for adjusting speed in which you move, deadzone for the joystick, and a nice selection of special attacks that provide a variety of options if one isn't working for a particular girl's stage. While the power ups within the stages are limited, they do stack, and provide quite a lot of firepower if you play well. The laser seeks out close by enemies, and the rocket launcher....launches rockets.  These are not exclusive and you can run both at once, which is excellent. 

Overall, among the myriad of Ecchi/Hentai games on Steam, at the low price this is offered - it's worth at least twice that in terms of quality, gameplay, music, and fun factor. I recommend this to anyone who enjoys shmups, and maybe wants an easy break for a quick fix - as well as some attractive anime ladies that serve as rewards for good gameplay. 

To say I'm impressed by this game is an understatement, it's extremely well designed and a blast to play. I even used it as my first "Let's Perv" series video on YouTube. 

Reviewers Note: There are of course patches to add certain bits back into the game that are missing. Your girls are basically barbie dolls until patched - but the dev has been "Kind Enough" to provide a link to said patch within the game itself. Thumbs up on them for doing so. 

I give Deep Space Waifu a 5/5. 
Do yourself a favor and pick up this gem and the DLC. You won't be disappointed.

36102549.review:
Normally I don't dominate Shumps.

This game is a nice fun game, took me 2 hours ot beat the game, and really only because I quit it to get the DLC so I could 100% the game.

Only, the reason I didn't is because the One Hand Mode achievements just literally don't work.

The artwork itself is good, although sometimes the possible lack of a reference becomes rather obvious in some ways. The style is good, just yeah. Again, sometimes the skill of the artist(s) behind the background images seems a bit lacking in specific level backgrounds and only in very specific areas of most images. 
Not to mention the poses of the "Waifus" eventually get stale. About 7 of them seem to share a mostly identical pose, and it's a bit of a shame IMO.

The music is fun, it does the job well enough that I've got no complaints about it.

Hilariously, after installing a censor-lifting patch (look to the guide, or the pinned thread on the forum) I was too focused into acing every level by the 3rd, that only until the Cheerleader did I really have a double take. That image, is really one of the best honestly, until you shoot the pompoms outta the way.

To be honest, was hoping that there'd be a cybernetics-having chick to shoot clothes off of, or maybe more than just a singular cat neko.
Like we could've gotten something like a sci-fi monster girl for one of the waifus, but noooooo of course not.

I joke ofcourse, that's not really that big a deal. Ofcourse thep roblem with having tons of female characters is that eventually with them all being mostly only one of 3 body types, the characters from a design standpoint begin to look rather stale and uninteresting beyond the hairstyle/color.
Could've had some alien species thrown in, maybe some black waifus.

The name "Deep Space Waifu" tends to give off a sci-fi vibe. Beyond enemies, your shots and powerups you collect during a level and specials you pick before the level, very few of the actual Waifus if not absolutely none of them give off such a Sci-fi vibe.

Like... basically 1 if not 2 or 3 can be called sci-fi, really.

I lost myself for roughly an hour and 45 minutes, so even if the lack of variety in the design of the characters really bugs me after having seen them all, I can't even complain, plus the game is really cheap too, so honestly if you like strip games, and shmups with sort of few bullshit moments fitting of the words "Bullet Hell" Just get this game.

Like... until the sale expires, it's basically less than 2 dollars, less than three if you also get the DLC, which adds about 5 or 6 levels, and after the sale, it'll be what... a rough total of 3 CDN?

Honestly even with the criminally short length to the game, it's honestly fairly worth the normal price when ignoring the sale.

It's no Demonstar, but hey, it's still pretty fucking great for the price, and the quality of the gameplay itself IMO.

36068731.review:
just to get it out of the way: for get your preconceived ideas of waifus and how neckbeardy this game looks at first glance. The gameplay alone is worth it.
tl;dr:game has some UI issues, but is a great time especially at such a low price. It also has tons of potentially so I can not reccomend this game enough. Just buy it now.
So, here we are. 
I'm not the kind of person who normally plays "waifu" games.
I'm not the kind of person who normally plays shmups.
I doubt the devs will take this seriously, heck, I don't even know if they'll read this, but I seriously think this game has a lot of potential. I don't know what they were trying to do, but the result is fantastic.
When I heard about a new waifu game combining the two in such a way, I instantly knew that the people behind this game knew what they were doing. I'm glad to say that I was correct. This game is jam packed with fun and witty descriptions, and dont even get me started on everything they do right when it comes to gameplay.

The waifu aspect is more than just to appeal to the horn dogs within us all. For instance, lets say that you have preferences and qualms with certain aspects of the human anatomy. Your goals can shift from speedrunning (which I feel has a lot of potential but needs a little bit more room to flourish) to killing enemies to select firing what you do and do not want to remove. This adds so much depth to the game, and its such a clever way to do it. Not only does picking and choosing what you do and dont want make you feel like doing more research, but it encourages a much more difficult and fun playstyle. Accidently removing clothes is the wooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooorst. Never thought I would be saying those words.

As a result of this difficulty becomes tied not to skill but to priorities. You're not on casual because you're bad, you're on casual because YOUR PRIMAL URGES DEMAND IT. Splendid stuff.

At its current price the game is literally a steal. Just buy it. Especially because of what the rest of this review will be about:
Potential. 
This game oozes it.
I touched upon this before with speedrunning, but with some fine tuning this game would be, and you've got to bear with me here because the fact that I am saying this about THIS game of all things means its good enough that I will throw away all embarrasment, dareIsayit a masterpiece.
On some levels the character's top might be indestructible until the skirt is destroyed (I'm talking the level with the chick who is obsessed with efficiency and time specifically) so that depth that I mentioned before is gone. That isn't every level, but hey its there. Come on devs just do me this one favor.

There may be further examples that I have yet to encounter, as I am writing this after my first sitting, but as it stands there are some nice clever moments such as when you try to remove one girl's glasses and she exclaims that she NEVER removes her glasses. To my dismay, I was not allowed to remove them anyway and suffer the consequences. With the personality that would be required to make that work on characters in the first place people may be inclined to go on a "second date" which I do not believe is possible to the best of my knowledge. Expanding on that is a no brainer. This would alllow for great story telling weaved into the gameplay, which is the hallmark of a masterpiece game.

Replayability is high, and I know this is a really off suggestion but the moment I started playing this game I envisioned a mode akin to breakout that keeps the bullet hell elements but keeps the player on their toes with something that requires a different kind of coordination. If this were an alternate ship type, and there were others in addition to this, the game's depth would be exponentially increased. 
Of course you don't want to bloat a game with too many mechanics, but this is not just some needless addition. It can be used in tandem with the "second date" suggestion.

What better way to give a character a personality than to change the gameplay to suit it? What kind of dates are you even going on?

Those two questions alone say more than I ever could.

8/10 game. I have some issues with some of the artistic choices but style is what it is. If this game is treated with the right love and care I can easily see myself bumping that up to a 10/10 some day. Only time will tell.

36029762.review:
A fun shmup with a rather interesting mechanic: you shoot parts of the girls' clothing to strip them and gain extra points while also transforming incoming enemy bullets into stars which give you even more points and charge up your special attack.

This is not gratuitous fan service as it's integrated with the shooting mechanic of the game. The gameplay itself is pretty simple: you have one button to shoot and another for your special move, after completing the game for the first time you even unlock a mode called 'one hand mode' which has auto fire so you only have to worry about evading and using your special move -pretty cool if you need a free hand while playing.

The game itself is very good but could benefit a lot from more variety of enemies (apparently this is addressed in the dlc).
Overall a great game with a good price and a kickass soundtrack (seriously look it up)

10/10
It's not like my parents can get any more disappointed anyways.

35988373.review:
Deep Space Waifu. Ich weis noch nicht einmal wie ich dem ganzen einen deutschen Titel verpassen soll. Weite Weltraum Traumfrau? Nein manchmal sollte man Englische Titel nicht verdeutschen. Man stelle sich ein Spiel vor mit dem namen ,,Sterblicher Kampf" (mit rechtschreibfehlern) oder vielleicht ,,Welt der Kriegskunst" oder ,,Verteidigung der Ahnen" kurz VDA....

Aber zurück zum eigentlichen Spiel. Man spielt einen Bären mit Sonnenbrille, Lederjacke und geilem Gefährt und schießt feindliche Aliens in Stücke, dabei tut man das Mädel seiner Wahl noch Daten und ihr Stück für Stück die Kleidung zerschießen bis man selber zum Schuß kommt. Der Typische Charme der 80´er Jahre. Schon allein sich das Intro anzuschauen ist jedesmal eine befriedigung der Sehnerven und der Nostalgik.

Es ist ein wirklich gelungener Arcade Shooter mit nackten Mädels. Natürlich zensiert aber was für ein genialer Trick, man kann das Spiel auch Uncut machen indem man ganz einfach in dem Ordner des Spieles eine .txt Datei erstellt und sie nude.patch benennt. Schon hat man nackte Mädels. Ich war auch überrascht gewesen wie simpel dieser Trick ist. Jedes Hentai Anime Spiel sollte meiner Meinung nach diesen Einfachen Trick haben.

Der Soundtrack ist EPISCH. Wirklich eines der besten Musik Stücke die ich je gehört habe. Versetzt mich jedesmal in nostalgischer Laune, in der Zeit der Videospiele die noch etwas simpel gebaut waren und wirlich nur zum schnellen Zeitvertreib dienten. Man sollte sich den Soundtrack wirklich kaufen.

Es gibt auch einen EIN-HAND Modus damit man die andere Hand zum Onanieren oder Masturbieren verwenden kann, wenn man den will. Wer das auch immer hin bekommt muss ja wohl der Coolste Typ oder das Coolste Mädel sein was es gibt denn bei so vielen Lichteffekten könnte ich mich nicht auf den sexuellen Teil konzentrieren. Tatsache eignet sich der Modus nur um neben bei die ganze Zeit sein Bier in der Hand zu halten. Oder man ist Linkshänder, dann könnte es klappen. Ausserdem warum sich den Stress im Spiel geben wenn man am Ende des Levels eh das Mädel Fotografieren kann und es sich im Ordner nochmal anzuschauen?

Der Preis ist für die Qualität lächerlich gering. Verglichen mit anderen Spielen die noch mehr Kosten würden. Und die Achievments sind leicht zu bekommen weswegen man geneigt ist das Spiel durchzuspielen an einem Tag. Für mich ist dieses Spiel wirklich sehr gelungen und wer ebenfalls Hentai Erotik mag sollte es sich kaufen.

10/10

(Kein Fuchsmädel diesmal aber ein scharfes Gamermädel das mich leicht an Arcade Ahri erinnert.)

35980937.review:
Deep Space Waifu is an easy shoot-'em-up where the stages are giant anime girls that you can shoot the clothes off of. Surprisingly for a $2 fanservice game, it also manages to deliver fairly consistent audio and visual design.

There's not actually all that much else to say - it comes through with its premise, even though the premise is incredibly silly. My only real gripe with the gameplay is that several of the 13 stages feel rather same-y, because there's only three normal bosses which get repeated across 9 of those 13 stages, but it's a fairly short game (under 3 hours even with the expansion) that isn't going to wear out its welcome just because you have to beat some of the bosses multiple times.

I have to give Deep Space Waifu a thumbs-up. I wouldn't reallly recommend going out of your way to pick it up or anything, and despite the aura of incredible sleaze radiating from it, I don't think it would really work as porn? But... look, it's a competently made, if very easy, shooter for $2, and you get to look at naked anime girls while playing it. If that's what you want to buy, it's not going to let you down.

I played on Normal mode and found the difficulty just right, challenging enough to take many tries to win some of the later opponents, but not so hard that I'm screaming at the screen in frustration (I'm looking at you, Cuphead).  Shooting the clothing while manging the minions and fighting the bosses adds an extra layer of fun that helps mix up the bullet hell formula. Yet again morbid curiosity has led me to an interesting and slightly grubby game, you would have thought I had learned my lesson after Hunie Pop that whenever I get curious about a game that I should on no accounts actually buy said game until i've had chance to check it out (ok, I knew exactly what I was getting into with Hunie Pop but I severely digress) and then not to put stock into the smut on offer (How do I keep stumbling upon these games...) but to assess the game fairly by it's gameplay. So, lets start with story, you are a bear striding about the cosmos having it off with as many females as you can on your hoverbike. 

The Intro screen is basically as 80's as hell and I like it (what can I say I'm a sucker for anything in this 8-bit Teletext style) which leads to our, ahem, level select screen. Choose from one of three goyles (with another nine unlocked as you progress) and get ready to blast some alien scum to hell along with said lady's clothing. In terms of gameplay it's basically a bog standard bullet hell type shooter which, I will be honest, is not really my favourite genre of game but I did manage to find this game fun if a little frustrating (got to get that 100% rating after all, either do it properly or not at all...) and kept me occupied for around two hours to complete every "level" in the base game and the DLC includes a few more girls so add about another hour or so on top of that along with replaying the base levels once each (knocking up another two hours) for that for 100% completion.

Artwork wise it's nice enough, some nice artwork for the girls themselves although the enemies don't have much variety (even a palette swap would be appreciated) but the sprites themselves are rather spiffy-looking and theres really not much else I can say other than it looks good (although the dollar bills that replace your laser bolts on certain stages do add to the retinal clouding a little making flying into oncoming attacks that little bit more common) and the soundtrack is a rather nice but short electronic set that isn't frantic, allowing for a more relaxing gameplay experience.

In conclusion Deep Space Waifu is pretty much what you'd expect from an SBG (Spank Bank Game), the gameplay itself is enjoyable enough to warrant a look but it's really not for the hardcore Schmup fans. If you want something you can just leap into for about an hour or so every so often when you want to just relax then it's worth the £2.50ish I paid for it (Game, DLC, and Soundtrack) just don't expect too much from it. Fun game, nice art, get it if you're into this sort of thing. 

7/10

35851632.review:
[h1]Deep Space Waifu Review[/h1] 
(Price at Review Time: £1.59 + £0.79 DLC)
[b]I highly recommend this game to anyone.[/b]

[table]
[tr]
[th]Area[/th]
[th]Score[/th]
[th]Comment[/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Graphics[/td]
[td]10/10[/td]
[td]Lovely to look at with a nice style! Bonus points for retro mode![/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Gameplay[/td]
[td]10/10[/td]
[td]Such a fun, well made, polished shmup. Even if it's not the hardest bullet hell I've played it sure is fun.[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Soundtrack[/td]
[td]10/10[/td]
[td]Really relaxing soundtrack, a pure pleasure to listen to and is worth listening to outside of the game.[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Final Score[/td]
[td]10/10[/td]
[td]An all round amazing game worth your time and money. Especially at the current price and the new DLC![/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

Deep Space Waifu is another bullet-hell, shoot-em-up game and boy is it the most fun one I've played on Steam yet. Everything from the art style to the music, the girls to the gameplay is crafted with the intent to make your experience exciting and memorable, and it is just that. This game is easily the most fun shoot-em-up I've played yet, even if it's not the hardest.

The looks and style of the game is lovely. Visually it's a pleasing game, from the menus to the sprites and all things in between. Coupled with some excellent design choices (i.e. the menu system for stage selection being a tinder clone) it really looks and feels visually pleasing. The soundtrack adds a nice bit of atmosphere but keeps the tone relaxed while the hectic bullet hell is going on, a great bit of juxtaposition on the part of the devs.

The game feels great to play, the controls are excellent and responsive and you get a feel for your ship's hitbox immediately. You play as the loveable King Bear, after a fine girl to "date" by shooting the clothes off of her. Luckily you've picked up a space dating app and now you're lucky to be exposing the bodies of all these intergalactic chicks. 

The difficulty of the game is pretty well balanced with the early stages being a good way to find your feet on how to play the game, and giving you ample time to learn the clothing mechanics without hand-holding and the later stages being crazy, hectic messes of bullets, enemies and nude girls. Oh and, when you finish a stage a screenshot of the girl gets saved into the game's files in the clothing you left her in, with your score and difficulty proudly on display on the border of the polaroid. Excellent touch devs.

The difficulty is the same on the basic 3 modes, just the number of lives you have decreases from Super Casual's 8, down to Casual's 4 and right down to Faster's 2. This essentially means you can practise the stages on lower difficulties and then perfect it in 2 lives when you're ready, if you so wish.

There's also another difficulty "Gentleman's Mode" where you can't damage a single piece of clothing, if you do it's date over. Adds another level of replayability and really challenges you to be perfect with your firing.

In all, Deep Space Waifu is a game you shouldn't look past. If you're a fan of bullet hells, shoot-em-ups or just want something to play with a bit of tiddies in it. For the price, you're getting a brilliant game.

Also, one tip: Go to the game's files, into the Deep Space Waifu_Data folder and create a file called nude.patch to play the game in full glory.

35741522.review:
Reminding one of top down shooters from days past, but with a hentai edge, this is a fun and well made game. It's colourful, pretty, runs smoothly, and is rewarding (if you find art of exposed ladies to be rewarding).  It can be difficult at first, but with practice, or for those who are already into similar games, it's definitely playable.  While I'm not a fan of the one hand mode, I can appreciate the consideration shown by its inclusion, and that along with other features such as the automatic snapshot upon completining a stage go to show the amount of care and effort put in by the developer.  Extreme gentleman that he is, the developer has also added new content during the game's life, as well as providing perhaps the most accessible method to... restore specific visual content that I have ever seen in a Steam game.  In regards to said content, the ladies are well designed, with enough visual styling to convey at least a basic sense of personality.  As well, the use of a dating app style interface as a selection menu is clever and memorable.  

In conclusion, if you like the idea of playing as a dapper mouse who blasts the clothes off of an assortment of pretty ladies, or if you enjoy top down ship based shooters with a colourful flair, then give this game a chance.

I just don't get it; why does this game have a 98% positive?

If you're looking for a decent bullethell game this isn't it, easy as fuck to 100% and hitboxes are wonky as shit.

If you're looking for a weeb game well I'm sorry but this isn't it either, go play a visual novel or something because as far as I'm concerned the only thing even mildly weeb about this game is the artstyle.

If you're looking for a porn game then you MIGHT be in luck, but while I''m certainly no expert on porn games I definitely feel that a quick search on google could yield a porn game of this quality if not higher that you can play for free in your browser.

If you're looking for a game to get a quick 100% completion on then I suppose this is a good one.

If you're looking for a cheap game with steam cards you aren't in the right place either I'm afraid.

I bought this game exclusively for the neat achievements to spell "waifu" on my profile, I saw it had trading cards and I like bullethell games so I figured this would be money well spent. Fast forward 2 hours later and I've gotten all achievements and only received ONE of my FIVE trading cards. I don't feel like ranting about this for too much longer because it is apparent that the dev(s?) don't feel like spending that much time on the game themselves.

This game isn't EXTREMELY bad, and I feel that for $2 it's a decent buy, but I can't wrap my head around the 98% positive and as such I feel that it is my civic duty to give it a thumbs down despite the fact that the game isn't the WORST thing.

Deep Space Waifu reminded me why I love video games.  <3

That being said I did encounter a few glitches/bugs. For some reason when I would hit the back button on my controller at the end of a level, it would throw the "final snapshot" to the top right of the screen and it wouldn't back out. This was easily remedied by switching to the mouse quick and clicking the button, but it was a minor annoyance. The other bug was at the beginning of the game where it asked what controller I had. When I went to choose it bugged out and I had to remedy things again by temporarily switching to the mouse until I got to the main menu. Again, easily remedied and not a game breaker, but a minor annoyance. 

For 2 bucks you really can't go wrong. The shooter aspect of it is fun and addictive and the cute anime ladies are like an icing on an already delicious cake. It's over the top, cheeky, corny as all hell, and just plain fun. :D

35444012.review:
Deep Space Waifu. Думаю, здесь не подходит "не суди книгу по обложке", ведь по самому названию понятно содержание.
Итак, наконец-то я разблокировал всех девушек и разорвал их одежду в клочья. А что это значит? Правильно, время [strike]дрочить[/strike] написать обзор на эту вполне простенькую, но вполне увлекающую игру для таких же анимешников-извращенцев, как я.

[h1]Сюжет[/h1]
По сюжету мы Медведь-чан (ориг. Bear-chan), крутой чувак, который катается на космическом мотоцикле и носящий маску медведя (привет, Hotline Miami) и находимся в футуристическом мире, где нам предстоит облапать девок со всей галактики! 
Такой вот сюжет. Если я правильно его понял. Но его нет.

[h1]Геймплей[/h1]
Ну, тут все просто и предельно ясно. Наша задача разорвать как можно больше фрагментов тяночки и набрать как можно больше звезд, ведь за них мы можем открыть новую тянку. Но в этом нам будут мешать враги. Игра в жанре shoot 'em up, так что просто сидим и жмем на левую кнопку мыши и живем счастливо. А, еще есть "Однорукий режим", для тех, кто у нас Юлий Цезарь, который может одной рукой играть в игру, а другой может греть йогурт для своей вайфу. 

[h1]Саундтрек[/h1]
Тут мало что можно сказать. Композиций мало, но все они в тему.

[h1]Графика[/h1]
[b]Какая к черту графика, если здесь есть голые 2д-тян?! Вы там совсем с ума сошли?![/b]

[h1]Достижения[/h1]
Зарабатывать ачивки тут проще простого. Я не все заработал, но и не ставил цель. Может, вам повезет. Хотя что я уж так, тут везение даже не нужно, просто поставьте себе цель.

[h1]Вывод[/h1]
Deep Space Waifu вполне подходит, чтобы скоротать вечер в одноруком режиме. 8/10.

35259293.review:
上手简单的飞行射击类游戏，无论从哪个角度来说，都很爽快……
画风还不错，属于略显简单的那种，敌人与BOSS也都大同小异。
游戏难度一般，流程较短，只有13个妹子，像我这样的强迫症患者可以玩上两个小时，不然的话……全通一个小时都用不上。
而且游戏内几个游戏难度，除了最后一个“绅士难度”意以外，都没什么区别，只是残机数量变化了而已……反正我是一直2残机难度全通的。绅士难度要求不能击破任何一个服装部位，明显是跟自己过不去，我就没兴趣了。
游戏两种模式没有根本区别，第一个是HD高清模式，第二个是复古模式，也就是更贴近像素风。
击破每关之后，可以暂时自由移动镜头，进行阅览，之后可以保存照片至游戏文件夹，照片的样子取决于你衣服的击破程度……所以我为了取得高清和复古两种画风的服装100%击破收集，还是稍微花了些时间的。
击破一关之后，重新开始这一关卡可以选择单手模式，空出来的一只手可以用来忙些别的。
辅助武器建议尽量多选择拾取Laser弹，因为最多可以带三个辅助武器，多拾取的时候就会按照拾取先后顺序顶替掉先前的，但被顶替掉的不会消失，会继续在屏幕上飘……还可以继续拾取，然后顶替。
特殊武器，也就是bomb，我更喜欢第一个全屏清弹幕……
在敌人刚出来的时候尽快消灭，能有效减轻弹幕压力，但部分关卡如果不尽快击破服装，可能会导致服装无法100%全破。另外，在服装没有全破的情况下击败BOSS，也会导致服装没能100%全破，所以请适当控制你的输出。
从整体来说，还是能值回票价的。

35244336.review:
[h1] DEEP SPACE WAIFU – игра, где ты можешь найди свою идеальную ВАЙФУ среди взрывов! Это казуальный strip 'em up экшн, полный ярких цветов и девушек! [/h1]

Насколько я понял разработчиков, сильно вдохновила игра, вышедшая в 2001 году, под названием Sentimental Shooting. На каждом этапе есть две цели - сбивать корабли, чтобы набрать очки и разблокировать больше этапов, и рвать одежду девочек по частям.

[b]Цензура и как от неё избавиться.[/b] По умолчанию изображение подвергается цензуре, но есть быстрое решение, которое помогает это исправить. Как это сделать? Легко!
[b][i] Заходим по пути Steam > steamapps > common > Deep Space Waifu > Deep Space Waifu_Data folder
Создаём новый .txt файл
Переименовываем его в nude.patch
Готово. Больше никаких пластырей [/i][/b]

[b] Стиль. [/b] Как раз это и является для меня лучшей частью этой игры (не считаю обнажённых девушек). Хоть он и является производным от Hotline Miami, он хорошо работает здесь и создает приятную, мечтательную атмосферу, которая прекрасно подходит к настроению игры. Есть также некоторые интересные детали анимации - мне понравилось, как волосы девочек трепещут, когда они попадают в поле зрение игрока.

[b] Языковая составляющая игры. [/b] Есть варианты на английском и японском языках, но образцы голоса все на английском языке. Голоса не уникальны для каждой девушки (всего одна из них для всех), что неутешительно, но, поскольку в игре не имеется диалогов, что это не очень важно для меня. С положительной стороны, перевод довольно хорош. Это видно в профилях Tinder для каждой девушки в меню. Они короткие, но хорошо написанные и смешные.

[b] Звук. [/b]В игре не так уж и много музыки, всего 4 трека, которые я думаю, подобраны очень хорошо.

[b] Геймплей. [/b] Фактический игровой процесс в лучшем случае посредственный. Эта игра легкая, а механика слишком упрощена. В игре почти нет разнообразия и всего около 10 противников, включая боссов.

[b] Достижения. [/b] Есть достижения Steam, но нет списка лидеров по очкам. Как правило, рейтинги должны быть обязательными для любого shmup. Игра  не займет много времени, чтобы получить 100% достижений, если это имеет для вас значение. Мне потребовалось всего 2 часа, чтобы разблокировать их всех.

Итак, слабый игровой процесс, но мне все равно понравилось. 
Уникальность и цена за 60 рублей не так уж и много за данное детище. 
В конечном счете, я надеюсь, что игра продается достаточно хорошо и разработчики посчитают нужным сделать продолжение с большей сложностью и расширенной историей.

[h1]Общая оценка[/h1] – 7/10

35203976.review:
Looking for something Short, Casual and yet daring? Then look no further, Deep Space Waifu covers all that.

0) Choose a Girl (stage)
1) Select optional Ship Upgrades
2) Fly around in a little ship
3) Fire at enemies
4) Shoot clothes of big-boobed Manga chicks.
5) Destroy the boss at the end

Nude Manga Fanart imagery aside the soft retro graphics coupled with the fitting sounds of a typical 80s action movie sequence doesn't leave much to ask for. 

Personally I have completed 100 % including achievements in the above time spent on this game and let that be an indicator on how long it takes to complete all stages with 5/5 Stars. The gameplay is straight-forward and provides an intuitive flow which makes Deep Space Waifu almost-toddler-level-friendly (figure-of-speech, don't actually let your baby play) however even competitive-minded people will be able to satisfy their masochistic urges through being able to set new standards, reach better scores and improve over time. 

More than that gamers will be able to brag to their friends about having played a game that doesn't officially "exist" on gamer melting pots like Twitch.

Out-of-the-box once a target's clothes have been shot down, models in this game wear underwear but a nude-patch is 'built-in' and as all one has to do is put a .txt file in one of the directories I feel like this is proof that the developer has a sense of humor which I find fantastic however some pervs may also benefit even more from 'One-handed-mode' this way albeit for me, One-Handed has become standard practice as my accuracy and response time is greatly increased when using just the mouse .... :^)

All of these aspects combined make for an outstanding, tilt-free indie-title that will kill at least an hour or two of your time if you let it, provide you with conversational topics and considering the low price and unique gameplay Deep Space Waifu is absolutely worth the purchase.

<3

35167944.review:
Deep Space Waifu

What can be said about deep space waifu?
A lot actually, as a connoisseur of games that also have hentai in them I will be your guide in this dillemma.
(Keep in mind, I used a controller for my playthrough, so keyboard/mouse users may not experience control related issues listed here)


So I'll start with the pros;
Its a fun bullet hell, sorta like what you'd see in the arcade, though if you're expecing high end-bullet hell gameplay similar to touhou then drop that expectation right now. The gameplay is rewarding in the sense that you get naked ladies if you do good. The game also has a one handed mode for those [b]SWEET, SWEET LETTER ACHIEVEMENTS[/b]. Its got that hotline miami WOAG SO 80S!!!! vibe that you'd get from games like hotline miami, the nude patch is easy to install, its already installed! Just slap a .txt file in the files, name it "nude.patch" and you're good to go! That being said half of the [spoiler]'ginas[/spoiler] were great.

Thats where the pros end and the cons begin, boy did I get plenty to type about here.
1. The game is extremely glitchy. The [strike]character[/strike] waifu select screen is barely functional when using controller. The game once glitched and the game set the second to last waifu, the catgirl, at 100%'d even though I had yet to even attempt the level. When I was fighting the final boss I seemingly got killed by nothing, and a few times that stupid rainbow line seemingly teleported onto me. I've never spammed bombs so much in any bullet hell in my life. Then once I beat the final boss I was stuck on the "Press B to go back" screen forever. Pressing B did nothing so I alt F4'd. Remember when I said half of the vaginas were great? Suprise the other half were an arbys sandwich. Another issue I got with the game is its so damn flashy call me a kotaku tier casual if you want, half of the time I could barely tell what is a bullet and what isn't.

Overall, this game is [url=https://youtu.be/W9DST-6jIBU?t=147]pretty good[/url]

35058779.review:
Deep Space Waifu is a pretty easy bullet hell shooter; the game isn't supposed to be what's hard, after all. I managed to 100% complete it in 2 hours, and 4 of the 13 girls I really liked; the rest I felt indifferent towards, but they weren't bad.

Regarding gameplay, you can play with a controller, the keyboard, or a mouse. One-hand mode is unlocked after 5-starring a girl (i.e. doing well enough in the stage) and all it does is enable autofire so you can use your free hand for other things, such as drinking tea or petting your cat/dog.

There are difficulty options, but they don't really matter; the game can be played on any difficulty and you'll still unlock everything just the same. The harder difficulties are only there for those who want a bullet hell challenge (and if that's the case, why are you playing this instead of a more serious bullet hell game?)

I recommend this game because it's easy (but not too easy), has enough content to justify its price (especially on sale), and I can almost guarantee there will be at least one girl who appeals to your tastes due to their variety. [spoiler]I'm a weeb with a giantess fetish so this game was more appealing to me than it should've been.[/spoiler]

34980162.review:
Второй очень необычный скроллер после Sine Mora, в который мне довелось поиграть. 

Управляете кораблём и помимо пришельцев расстреливаете доступные части одежды на теле вайфу. Когда интима становится слишком много, появляется босс: в большинстве случаев это летающий корабль, в исключительных - крайне враждебное нижнее женское бельё с тяжёлой артиллерией. До уничтожения босса у вас будет возможность разорвать одежду на других частях тела, ибо во время боя вы будете двигаться по кругу. Иногда даже после уничтожения босса не стоит терять бдительности и отпускать преждевременно палец с левой кнопки мыши, ибо потом может последовать момент, когда те самые уничтоженные вооружённые мехо-трусы могут предоставить вашему вниманию предмет одежды, чьё разрушение дарует вашим глазам прекрасный вид, а заодно заполнит до отказа идикатор одежды. 

Теперь самое плохое: в игре мало девушек. Сколько, говорить не буду. Но даже некоторых из них не открыть даже раза с третьего или четвёртого. Я лично долго пытался раздеть до гола Mitsumi. Очень надеюсь, что разработчик будет обогощать список вайфу.

И кто не переигрывал с психопаткой Yumi много-много раз подряд?

34902669.review:
Finally! A game design for me. (or just my name sake.)
Saw TheRPGMinx play this game and decide to get it...and it got me the best 6.9 hours in my life.

It's a very VERY Japanese shoot 'em up with a twist...the purpose of the game is to kill (most) enemy and reach the boss while simultaneously shoot off "clothes" from the background that is an anime girl... 
(or not, there is even a "Gentlemen Mode" which the concept is turn upside down: Don't shoot up any clothes.)

Despite the concept, it is hard as nails (again, very VERY Japanese shoot 'em up) and the game is basically 80% bullet hell, while you have to dodge bullet, kill enemy, get high score, and don't forget to shoot off those clothes...it gets chaotic. Even more when most people will be distracted for obvious reason...but because of this, when you finally 5 star and 100% one level, it feels satisfied af.

Overall, if you like medium-to-VERY-hard shoot 'em up and not some animephobic fukcwit who will die to the fact that anime exist. I highly recommand this game.
Yes it's kind of short, you can complete it in like 2 hours [strike]and ask for a refund[/strike]. But it only cost like a cup of Starbucks. I sold a TF2 Key and a Mercenary Grade Hat for it...and it get me way more fun then using that key to unbox any crate.

ものすごく良い。琴線に触れるものを感じた。
エロゲーもシューティングも、ほとんどしたことないけど、
二つのジャンルがこんなに相性が良いなんて。
スコアに興味がなくても、全裸を拝むためなら頑張れる。
そもそも基本難度が高くない。
服を一切破いてはいけない紳士モードは話が変わるが。

絵柄こそ、作画崩壊ぎみの子も多少いるけど、
そのチープ感もご愛嬌。可愛い子もちゃんといる。
音楽も良く、カジュアルにSTGを楽しむのにうってつけ。

願わくば、女の子、シチュエーション、
ポージングや服装のバリエーション、
すなわちステージが増えたら更に素晴らしいのにと思うわけで、
アプデでも新作でもいい、パワーアップして欲しいと思う。

女の子が好きなら是非買うべき。当然、ヌードパッチも当てて。
脱衣STGというジャンルの素晴らしさを発見できただけで大満足。
日本のメーカーさんも脱衣STGもっと作ったらいいのに。
下手なエロよりワクワクどきどきして癒された。

製作された方に心からの感謝を。最高。
