34850401.review:
A part en faire l'éloge, je ne sais quoi dire à propos de ce jeu...

Techniquement parlant, c'est un shoot'em up classique où vous devez deshabiller des filles que vous venez de rencontrer sur une appli de rencontre.

La difficulté est quasi nul à part si vous choisissez le mode "gentleman", là vous aurez réellement mérité de voir votre waifu dénudée :3

Pas beaucoup de niveaux mais ils comportent différents mode ce qui laisse place à une bonne rejouabilité.

Une bande son excellente, je ne m'attendais vraiment pas à une ost d'aussi bonne qualité pour un jeu comme ça.

Le gros défaut du jeu pour moi, c'est sa durée de vie qui est de, grand max, quatre heures. Je pense que quelques niveaux supplémentaires, voir un workshop n'aurait vraiment pas été de trop...

En conclusion, que vous soyez ou non un fan du style, jouez à DEEP SPACE WAIFU vous ne le regretterez pas. ;) 

Sur ce, bon jeu à tous. ;)

EDIT: J'ai rédigé une évaluation sur le dlc "ACADEMY", si vous voulez la voir c'est par ici➤  http://steamcommunity.com/id/YukiCobra/recommended/701531/

$1,99 is a steal. I have to admit I bought it solely because of synthwave (and boobs) and the game was much more fun that I expected it to be.

The sense of humor is great, the game actually looks much better when you play it than how it looks on the screenshots too. The mechanics are fun and have lots of potential imo.
I loved the OST, it's one of the absolutely best indie game soundtracks I've ever heard until now. It took me 2 hours to complete every achievement, but the developer(s?) is working on the game constantly and adding new girls and updates which is pretty sweet.
Although you can't really mod the game officially and create your own girls, which would be great.

I really love this game and I hope the developer keeps going in this direction and brings us more stuff like this. Might be that it hit certainly in my taste, but I haven't had so much fun with a game in months or years.

34767638.review:
Deep Space Waifu (DSW) ist ein kurzweiliges Shoot 'Em Up für gut 2€. Für das Geld bekommt man 13 unterschiedliche Level (10 "Normale" und 3 "Bonus" Level) mit einer Länge von je gefühlt 3-6 Minuten geboten. Bei der Steuerung stehen einem Maus, Keyboard oder Controller zur Auswahl, wobei die Steuerung mit der Maus sehr gelungen ist, während die Tastatur eine spürbare Eingabeverzögerung aufweist (zur Steuerung mit Controller kann ich nichts sagen). Will man alle Achievements im Spiel erreichen, muss man im Grunde genommen lediglich alle Level zweimal durchspielen (bis auf die Bonuslevel), was gut in 2 Stunden machbar ist. Wer will, kann an der persönlichen Highscore arbeiten, indem schwierigere Modi gespielt werden.

Als positiv empfand ich auch die ungezwungene Art des Spiels. Es nimmt sich selbst nicht allzu ernst, und macht hier und da einen Witz auf Kosten des Spielers. Des weiteren empfinde ich, wie bereits erwähnt, die Steuerung mit der Maus als sehr gelungen. Auch der Gesamteindruck vom Spiel ist, im Großen und Ganzen, ordentlich.

Meine einzigen Kritikpunkte am Spiel wären die oben erwähnte Eingabeverzögerung beim Spielen mit Tastatur, sowie eine etwas umständliche Menüführung, so kann man bei der Levelauswahl immer nur zum nächsten Level gehen, nicht zum vorigen, des weiteren wird man am Ende eines jeden Levels zurück ins Hauptmenü befördert.

Ich würde sagen, wer Lust auf einen kurzweiliges, relativ simples Shoot 'Em Up für zwischendurch hat, der kann für den Preis wenig falsch machen, vorausgesetzt, dass einem die Thematik des Spiels nicht zuwider ist.

34700881.review:
I cannot believe that I am even saything this, but this is a really fun arcade shoot-em up!  It seemed like a ridiculous concept.  Seeing all of the positive reviews, I thought I would give it a chance.  As it turns out, the concept works really well game-wize.

The object is to finish the level and shoot the background image girl's clothes off (or keep them on with Gentleman mode).  You finish the level by going through the different waves of aliens and beating the final boss (sometimes there is another boss earlier in the game).  If you beat the game, you get a snapshot of the girl.  How much clothes she is wearing in the end is determined by how many background clothes zones you were able to destroy.  You don't get a snapshot if you lose all of your lives but still destroy all of the background zones.  You don't get a completed snapshot if you beat the aliens but don't destroy all of the background zones.  The game moves all around the background girl giving you multiple opportunities to destroy zones.

What makes this interesting, game-wize, is the balance involved.  You will reach background zones that require X damage to destroy and remove a chunk of clothing.  Sometimes you will get three or four zones at once.  However, you are being shot at by aliens.  These aliens are different types, different speeds, and different shot abilities.  Plus boss enemies.  There's a balance in figuring out when to shoot the background and when to shoot aliens.  Spend too much time shooting aliens, and you will not destroy all of the background zones.  Destroy all the background zones but die doing it, and you will not get a snapshot.  It's pretty satisfying when you can line up an alien with a zone to get a two-fer.

Despite the fact that this is adult themed plus a patch that can make this even more adult, it's a very fun arcade game.  I love match three games, and Huniepop is actually a very good and very challenging match three game with an adult twist.  I would not have bothered with Huniepop if were not a good game.  Deep Space Waifu is actually a decent and challenging arcade game with an adult twist.  It doesn't have a story, but it's a very fun and rewarding game.

34491761.review: Deep Space Waifu si è rivelato un fulmine a ciel sereno. Ammetto di essere stato incuriosito dal bunner (donnine stile anime seminude), ma quello che si celava dietro quest'ultimo va ben oltre le più rosee aspettative. Si tratta del più classico degli arcade. Uno sparatutto a scorrimento stile anni 80 che fa della immediatezza il suo punto forte. Alla guida di una astronavicella/motocicletta spaziale, dovrete farvi strada tra una miriade di nemici. Questi sono tra loro vari per tipologia, pur ripresentandosi in massa (uno ad uno) in ogni singolo livello. La difficoltà sta nell'individuare i punti in cui colpire le vesti della ragazza di turno, dovendo fare attenzione all'assalto di un gran numero di nemici su schermo. L'idea di fondo, per quanto strizzi l'occhio ai segaioli di mezzo mondo, risulta simpatica dinanzi a chi sa vedere oltre (il sottoscritto si avvale di questo dono...almeno in questo caso). Il titolo è piuttosto breve. Nel completare ogni livello al 100%, corrispondente alla denudazione totale della tipa di turno, oltre che al raggiungimento delle cinque stelline, vi basteranno dalle 2 alle 3 ore. Nella sua semplicità il gioco regala momenti di puro appagamento, grazie ad un livello di sfida interessante. Il gioco offre una certa flessibilità sul numero di vite con cui partire e sull'incremento del livello di difficoltà. Per meno di 2 euro vi assicurate un titolo simpatico e dalla giocabilità stellare.

34363311.review:
打了补丁之后，细节更丰富，其实不打补丁也没兔子圣光啥的，不过没那么多细节而已。
就游戏本身而言，是把爆衣和射击结合在了一起，算是比较独特的玩法。
游戏没什么难度，当然，其实我就玩了纯鼠标模式而已，毕竟8条命。
不过有几关BOSS实在是太脆了，衣服都还没剥完，BOSS就躺了，搞得还要重来……
另外，所谓单手模式的说法，算是给此类游戏开了个不大不小的脑洞，似乎你可以腾出另外一只手去做点什么……[spoiler]（我的意思是点烟之类的，千万别想歪了，咳咳。）[/spoiler]
不过在我看来，完全没必要，劳动人民的智慧是无穷的，其实纯鼠标模式不就是单手模式嘛，没啥区别，移动射击特技一个鼠标就可以控制完，难道有谁是拿两只手操作鼠标的么？
游戏自带截图功能，每关结束点一下自动保存当前关卡过关时的插画立绘，至于图片的具体内容就看你能射……击到什么程度了，也许全副武装，也许赤果果一只大白羊，谁知道呢，是吧？
这款游戏还是蛮值的，没什么能让你感到无聊的地方，单手模式快节奏全部13个妞统统剥光一次欣赏完福利之后成就就全解锁了，一切都很简单，这点很赞。
总之，好评+推荐。
-------------------------------------------------------
对了，补充一点，最后一关，当你把公主剥干净之后并且把BOSS干掉之后在结束计分画面前有几秒空闲时间（貌似这是其他关所没有的情况），然后你可以对着公主下面某个曾经被重点加密但是被英勇的你一路解放出来的地方射射射，之后就会从公主的那个部位冒出很多很多的带水纹的小泡泡来，这真是一个非常有爱的设计，一个让人情不自禁眼前一亮的设计……不过，这些泡泡究竟是什么呢？……不管你们知不知道，反正我是不知道的。

34257774.review:
User Interface criticisms:

1. Like Tinder apps, there is no way to just go back to a specific level, instead having to cycle forward only to the level you want to play. There is not even "go back to previous photo" options.

2. A bug, but after some time playing, I cannot have the main menu selection select "Retro" mode. Not that it matters, as the HD mode looks better and the models in the levels you play in aren't pixelated.

The good:

1. Cheap thrill shooter game, the premise is destroy enemies for a high score and destorying "terrain" to get the best end level picture. The "terrain" being the anime girl's clothes of the level.

2. Soothing music to shoot flying on screen enemies with.

3. The art direction is easy on the eyes, Dark background with enemies bright and standing out.

4. Many difficulty options, from a one hand cursor play mode, to needing a keyboard and cursor plus less lives and the incentive to not destroy the girl's clothes (quite difficult).

5. You can customize controls.

The bad:

1. No story. Just what I presume is some bear, or a guy wearing a bear's head on a space jet ski shooting up 50 foot tall space women after looking them up on Tinder.

2. There is a bug somewhere that if you do not destroy a big ship before the next flight area, the ship simply disappears.

3. I am not sure that the above bug ties into this but if you hit ESC to select restart the level, the indicator for "Gentleman's Mode" disappears and somehow upon getting to the final boss, the final boss is unkillable. With Nekotine's level, I got a five star score, 100% clothes, and my power ups all there, but only to find out the final boss cannot be defeated.

4. Other than a straight beam, there is no weapon variety outside of certain cued places in levels. But that variety is also limited, a timed missile launcher for spike damage and a laser turret for homing in on enemies.

5. The anime girls you collect as photos are not as varied in poses or body build. There is only three base models and everything else is just a different photoshop layer turned on for each character. That one photo with the two (I think) sisters has the bottom sister's model reused.

6. While the music background track is soothingly sweet, there is no variety.

7. All variety complaints are expected with a cheap game.

The challenge:

1. Gentleman's Mode is difficult. It is easy to have the mindset to instantly rip the girls' clothes off, but it is difficult to keep that pea-shooter in check and only targeting enemies. This may not be bad, but moving with just a keyboard makes things difficult. There is no variable speed with keys. May try this with a controller.

Summary:

Cute and sweet shooter to pass short bursts of time with and incentive to play "photographer" by how well (or how bad) you shoot the level up. Price is right for the variety.

34221626.review:
[b][i]DEEP SPACE WAIFU[/i] is an outstanding addition to the adult game genre.[/b] Sure, there isn't a ton of content, but what is there is very high quality and certainly worth more than the small asking price. The most important aspect of adult-themed games is that [i]the game is fun[/i], and it is not just a collection of smutty artwork. Well, [i]DEEP SPACE WAIFU[/i] is fun. 

[i]Essentially, this is an arena shooter where the goal is to shoot all the clothes off the girl in the background.[/i] Is this the most solid shooter out there? Not by a long shot, but it definitely checks enough of the right boxes to keep me entertained for a couple of hours. It plays really well with either a controller or a mouse. There is a very good selection of options and difficulty and challenges. One minor flaw I found is that sometimes the bullets are hard to see due to blending into the background. Oh well, who cares.

I think the best aspect of this game is that the whole thing has charm. There is a ton of little details that I'm quite impressed with. Things like the animations on the loading screen, and the 'intimacy warning' before the boss battle, and that pixel art city it shows. That's some really nice artwork. Plus lets not forget that the devs have added content since release, and are planning DLC, which I will most assuredly pick up day one.

[b]Pros:[/b]
+The patch couldn't have been easier to implement; you don't even need to download anything
+The game mechanic idea is fresh
+The artwork is great and the girls look fantastic
+Definitely a fun shooter which is super important with an adult-themed game
+Nice game to 100% the achievements
+Price is too cheap; this could have been ten bucks and I'd be fine with it

[b]Cons:[/b]
-Bullets can blend into the background; along that same thought - the bullet patterns could use a bit of work, but this is nothing deal-breaking
-It is short, but hey, the price point reflects that

[b]A must buy if you like adult-themed games.[/b]

34177685.review:
It's ok. 

I like Shoot 'em Up's, but I can't stand Bullet Hell games, Deep Space Waifu straddles the line between the two, often uncomfortably so. If it wasn't for the retro music and boobies, there wouldn't be much to recommend here. Your weapons never upgrade, you just gain new sidearms in the form of lasers or rockets. The game forces you to loiter at the bottom of the screen which becomes a problem when you inevitably succumb to one of the bullet barrages: Your sidearms detach ready to be picked up again but are off-screen before you regain control of your craft. 
Once you've got past the novelty of the nudity in this type of game, there's nothing to keep you coming back. The game is equal parts amusing and annoying. 
Also, one of the levels is broken and features random deaths for no reason, and it's impossible to get 100% on it. 

It's a pity there's no "Meh" rating on Steam as this game would undoubtedly deserve one. I flipped a coin to decide whether it was thumbs up or down.

34149865.review:
OK guys this game is short! By the time of this Review I have beat the game in ONE hour. LOL A couple graphical errors(bike disappearing during skip scene), and some serious color match up issues. Like trying to dodge a yellow bullet thats on a yellow background(Invisible Bullets). I have avoided bullets that I could not see and I was like "phew that was close".

I think the hardest thing to do in the game is actually try to "explode" the girls clothes on the first pass, your a sitting duck trying to hammer out damage to the clothes. Or you have 2-3 lazer powerups, and you dont want to kill the boss yet LOL. since theres clothes to destroy.

Great game for the Price, to busy looking at the clothes trying to find the breakable parts, Which gets you killed ALOT lol. Only had one girl where I had to do a double take and look at the picture, Which made me lose completly where my bike was, I only realized that I died do to the sound effect. oops LOL

I catch myself multiple times saying "no, not really" when the game asks me if im ready. 

Theres not much to the game, Two powerups, one dumb fire missile, the other a lazer that auto targets. three super powers....*Cough* Four since there is the BEST super power. LOL one power is the clasic bomb from all bullet hells, one thats a Slow, which you have to hold the button, and a Speed up, also a hold to use. One thing I noticed with the Slow power is that sometimes the enemies are unable to shoot their bullets, this also applies to some bosses. it was really noticable and easy for the last boss, since the only thing I had to do was dodge its beam weapon.

All in all great short game. I can see some things being added. Like alternate powers, Multiplayer Coop, head to head score/100% disrobe clear kinda thing. 

Btw... I guess your some "Bear" riding a bike? to me it looked like a mouse, you know from biker mice from Mars kinda thing. so some of the dialogue threw me for a loop, when they were talking about some bear. I thought the bear was some evil villain or something. 

Enjoy :)

now this brings back real memories. 
I didnt know anyone else knew about the old japanese game "Sentimental Shooting" that was passed around a while back, but here it is, remade and in HD. a real nostalgia trip. 

gameplay is fast and responsive, the soundtrack went with a laid back space vibe, and the artwork is overall very charming. 
the game does has room for improvement however. the enemy types are not as varied as they could be, and there are only two powerups. 
the dev team does seem active, so with any luck, they'll continue to improve this title.

shortcomings aside, its a great time that fans of bullet hell shooters, or more importantly, nude women, should certainly pick up. especially considering the super cheap price.

33910316.review:
DEEP SPACE WAIFU delivers exactly what it advertises: A simple shoot-em-up game in deep space. With waifus you can undress. Come on, that sentence is the sole reason you are even interested in this page, admit it.

GAMEPLAY
You are the Bear King, riding on a space motorcycle, going on dates with all kinds of intergalactic women of all kinds. These dates are the game's definition of stages, with one girl acting as the backround for the stages. Enemies fly into the screen, which you must destroy. Actually, the enemies are secondary targets; the main targets are the parts of the girl's clothing, which would be torn apart piece-by-piece as you empty each part's HP. The more risque parts of the clothing, i.e. the underwear, can only be destroyed during boss battles. The battles themselves are not really difficult, especially if you are used to shooter games.

Tip: a certain patch must be manually installed by the user to fully enjoy the experience.

GRAPHICS
The illustrations are nice, although some illustrations are higher quality than the others. The game has a retro vibe to the interface. 

SOUND
The soundtrack is quite relaxing, although after hearing the same tune over and over it gets somewhat annoying.

Get this game if you enjoy casual shooting, or if you're a perv otaku like me. Either way, recommended.

33484155.review:
[h1] EDIT. #1 [/h1]
Today 07/27/17 the HD patch has been released and NOW we can say this game is about waifus. The art has been remarkably improved, despite it's still a bit "westerner" but that's just me. There's some visual fx and ingame HUD improvements as well. Devs are working hard, awesome work right there.


Way back in the days I've played a great game called Sentimental Shooting that involved dodging bullets while stripping off anime characters. When I saw Deep Space Waifu I thought it was (and IT IS) a copycat, but it has a bright of its own as I will elaborate further on with a little list. (TL;DR Version on the bottom)

[h1]PROS: [/h1]
[list]
[*]Vaporwave atmosphere and soundtrack
Wow. I don't know where the devs took inspiration from to merge the game with a vaporwave feeling but DAMN, it is GOOD. The menu pixelized graphics, the soundtrack, the colors.. everything is like a love letter to Sentimental Shooting and vaporwave.

[*] The very mechanics of the game
We can't deny that DSW is almost a Sentimental Shooting plagiarism, right? Well, it doesn't matter since everything is copied right and left in the game industry. What's cool about it is that excepting SS from the list, I've never seen another stripping schmup (I don't think that Namco's Dancing Eyes can be compared), EVER. Given how obscure SS is, DSW could be the modern pioneer of a new genre, it has potential to do so.

[*] Animated backgrounds
While SS had static backgrounds, DSW have some bit of animation here and there that makes it shines where SS didn't. It could be better, okay, but it's definitely an improvement over the original.

[*] Arisa Mikae and Sumeru Sayru
Lol, it seems the devs have played True Love! And the bonus stage is just hilarious, I won't even elaborate, just PLAY IT. 
[/list]

[h1]CONS:[/h1]

[list]
[*] Art
It is contradictory to have such a TERRIBLE art in a game where the main objective is stripping off waifus. Seriously, it is THAT bad. Amateur art found on 4chan is better than this. The devs should fire the art director and hire someone who can actually draw. Let's hope that the HD Patch announced will make the game look better.

[*] Polishing
We all know that the game is priced as low as it can get, but that's not an excuse to give zero fucks about polishing. The game looks crisp, some clothing hitboxes can be seen even without their HP frame. Put on some work, devs. 

[*] Way too easy
I hate to keep comparing DSW to SS but it can't be helped. SS used to be a VERY difficult game, japanese standard. DSW is easy enough to let me finish it with 100% achievements in less than 3 hours. Your shots pierce through the clothing and I guess that if it didn't, it would be closer to SS in terms of difficulty. Enemies can be a bit of a pain in the latter levels but it is no Touhou, the patterns can be dodged very easily. It should be more difficult to make it feel more rewarding to strip all them waifus. 


Wow, to everyone who's still with me, thank you. The review got more lenghy than I expected but that's because this is such a great little game, with a lot of potential, and it is so much fun to play and so enjoyable that I can't recommend it enough to all you fucking pervs and schmup fans out there. Let's just hope the devs won't get too greedy (this is a 1 USD - 3 BRL priced game guys, c'mon. Don't DLC-bullshit us)
[/list]

[h1]TL;DR:[/h1] Great game, "original" idea, vaporwave aesthetics. GET IT.

33390713.review:
I am a big fan of bullet hell shooters. I also like girls and good deals.

Deep Space Waifu is more than worth the $2 I spent on it.

Yes, it does have that stigma of being an "Anime Tiddie" game, but at its core, DSW is a lot more fun than I ever though I would have with it.

There are a few snags. It can be a bit repetitive, the girls may resemble something out of an SNES Rom, and in the the later stages the Slow-Mo power is a must have, but there's a lot to love here.

At it's core, this is a fun, fast paced, frenetic shooter with a great retro asthetic that I think deserves a look. Even if you don't want to shoot clothes off an immortal cat-girl from space, this is a great stylish shooter.

Edit: After picking up the DLC for DSW, I gotta say its more of the fun, bullethell cheesecake we came to expect and enjoy.

… Wait, what? For a game this cheap, they’re actually adding *more* content? (And the most important content at that – more chicks!) Really?

Look… I’m a cheap bastard. I’ve never purchased a game on Steam that wasn’t on sale (and usually substantially on sale). But this game is actually worth it’s “full” (still silly cheap) price. With the aforementioned adding of content, buttery smooth controls with a gamepad, smart and logical achievements, and the hilariously yes-it-really-is-that-simple patch, this game is a winner.

Sure, it doesn’t have the high-quality art of something like the Sakura series, and there aren’t really a tremendous number of girls (which are essentially the game’s levels) – but, hey, given the price and the fact that the bewbs are integrated into the gameplay (the level itself is interactive), I can’t say I was expecting much more.
 
A Deep Space Waifu 2 (Electric Boogaloo) with a couple dozen girls and high quality and high def character art would be just what the doctor ordered (for a higher price, course – which I’d gladly pay). You already have the game engine and the controls – you could have a freakin’ franchise here.

33334490.review:
I bought this for 1.00 or so during a sale, expecting a game that I could launch a few times to get reactions and then never touch again.
After launching, I was immediately blown away by the soundtrack and the aesthetic of the game. Both the visuals and the music stand out, and the soundtrack in itself is worth playing the game for especially with the low price tag.
Actual gameplay: It's your typical heavy bullets game, except while dodging fire from the enemies you also have to focus on 'shooting' clothes off. Pretty cool, right?
There's several difficulty levels and customization options so that you can play at a level you're comfortable with, making it ideal for veterans to the genre and noobies alike. 
TL;DR:
- Tight, refined controls and gameplay
- Naked anime chicks
- Soundtrack you want to listen to even when you're not playing the game
- Great art and visuals 
- Adjustable Gameplay

Overall a very great value for the price. 10/10, would waifu again.

The "eye candy" isn't just a bonus, it's perfectly integrated into the gameplay itself.

10/10, would shoot clothes off again.

33332519.review:
When I was browsing Steam and saw the title 'Deep Space Waifu', I chuckled inside and assumed it was going to be a visual novel (which I have no interest in), but to my surprise, upon hovering on the icon it was tagged as a shooter. I clicked the link. I thought the music was kinda catchy and the graphics were bright and shiny, but nothing really gripped me. In the Summer Sale it was super cheap with the soundtrack and I was more than willing to pay less than 2 dollars for a few nice tunes and a game to provide "teh lulz".

Cut to, my first play of the game. I wgenuinely did not expect to find more than 5 minutes worth of play time here, but the game mechanics, though simple are unique and interesting enough for me to actually want to play it. I also didn't expect more than generic fan service, so was glad to find some funny humour, both in the overall presentation and also the Waifu profiles.

The basic gameplay consists of shooting specific zone of the prospective Waifu's clothing to tear/damage/remove them, while avoiding enemies and their bullet fire. Eventually a mid boss will apear and then after a "Too much intimacy warning" an end of level boss will challenge you.

The game play is pretty smooth and the scoring mechanics are interesting enough. My one major grip with the game is the visual noise in 2 areas. The end of level bosses can shoot a laser and the while it's charging it shoots out a hail of bullets. The charging effect blends in with the bullet hail, so you really need to listen for the sound to have any chance of dodging said laser. The bigger issue is to do with the player hitbox. I'm pretty sure it's only the helmet of yourcharacter that can be hurt, but the light area on the handlebars kind of blends in when in your (my) peripheral vision.

So, obviously this game has naked (though nippleless) anime chicks in it. If you like to fap it hentai, you will like this game. If you like shmups and don't like to fap it to hentai, but don't mind people thinking you do, I recommend this game.

Soundtrack is nice, graphics are cool, get dat waifu!!

33211355.review:
Simply going off of advertising, I would not have bought this game for myself. however I am very glad I received it as a gift, as this is actually quite the hidden gem.

First off, this is a solid game. It's got retro gameplay, a bit Galaga-styled, and has a firm grasp of what makes those games great, and replicated it well for the PC. It also appeals to the collector inside of everyone by starting out with only a few girls (who serve the purpose of "levels") and only unlocking more as you get better and progress.

It is also terrific to see a company that is so considerate of users who may have physical disabilities. There is a "one handed mode" which allows you to play the game with only one hand, rather than using the mouse and keyboard together. This was clearly made with people who are missing a left hand in mind, so I doubt the majority of players would find this mode useful, but I thought I'd mention it's there regardless.

Another great surprise is that the soundtrack is amazing, easily one of the best I've heard in a sub-$5 game in a long time.

33145727.review:
As un-ironic as possible:

I had a damn blast with this game. The premise: shooting clothes off of girls from interdemensional tinder. It's stylized as hell. Each stage is a top down camera panning over the girls in different dirrections. You shoot several parts of each article of clothing until they disappear. But because enemies are constantly flowing in, you have to juggle Xevious meets Galaga, or shooting at targets on screen [i] while [/i] shooting enemies. The struggle between the two makes surprisingly compelling gameplay. DSW is hilarious and it's bright, muddy synthpop soundtrack is one of those indie soundtracks that seriously makes you wanna get it. I haven't wanted a soundtrack to a game this bad since Hotline Miami. 

100% completion takes about 2.5 hours. 69 achievements (lol). No difficulty achievements, but each stage needs to be played twice- the second time using One-Handed Mode, which you might need because the game has a very easy to install nudity patch

33139934.review:
攻略対象となる女の子一人一人がそれぞれ一つのステージとなっており、次々出現する敵の攻撃をかいくぐりつつ、女の子の服に設定された射撃ポイントを攻撃して裸にしつつ、ステージの最後に待ち受けるボスを撃破するのが基本的な流れ。
　面白いのは、程よく設定されたゲームバランスである。射撃ポイントは多く存在し、それぞれ結構な回数撃ちこまなければ脱衣には至らない。しかし、脱衣ポイントにはスコアが設定されていない。敵を倒していかなければスコアが稼げず、一定スコア稼げなければ次に攻略する女の子が解放されないようになっている。また、画面スクロールもなかなかいやらしく、敵を追うと脱衣ポイントを一つ逃したりと、脱衣と稼ぎの両立を程よく難しくさせている。このように、脱衣要素がシューティングゲームの醍醐味の一つである稼ぎの戦略性を増幅するスパイスとなっているのだ。
　ネタゲーと思わず、一度遊んでほしい良作である。

32673793.review:
这是一款爆衣STG游戏，结合了[b]小黄油[/b]和[b]弹幕游戏[/b]的部分特征
作为一款小黄油，人物的画风偏卡通向，每个人有各自的背景和职业（[strike]一般的绅士不会看的[/strike]），不同的服装（学生装，死库水，ol职业装等等[spoiler]竟然没有网袜！！！[/spoiler]），卖点基本是在爆衣的刺激上
作为一款弹幕游戏，[b]只有一个机型两种强化僚机[/b]（导弹和跟踪激光），小怪和boss的类型和招式屈指可数，毕竟是为爆衣服务（误）
成就方面，从头到尾任意难度通关两次（5星和爆衣100%）、看一次工作人员名单就可以拿全
（值得一提的是，二周目会给飞机提供自动射击的功能，给玩家空出一只手干某些事♂情[spoiler]撸点好低[/spoiler]）

个人提议：多一些机型和强化，或者有[u]创意工坊爆衣[/u]（[spoiler]想上车，当然这个价格，是我想多了[/spoiler]）

32494856.review:
Deep Space Waifu is a shoot 'em up where you shoot not only enemies, but also the girls' clothes off. I only played it for around 30-40 minutes because that's all I could get through without feeling completely bored, and a little frustrated,

The game itself controls as you'd expect, normal shoot 'em up experience, I've no complaints in that regard. My complaints however are mostly centred around the art, and effects. Every time you kill and enemy in Deep Space Waifu, large, colorful stars are scattered out of the explosion and remain floating on the screen until they are either picked up, or drift off. This makes it pretty hard to see the enemy bullets and confuses the eyes easily, I died many a time due to there just being too much on the screen at once. It was basically visual information overload. There were too many things on the screen.

My other main complaint is the artwork. It looks fairly amateur, which is totally fine under normal circumstances. It's a fairly short and inexpensive game that people can have fun with for a few hours. The art doesn't need to be perfect. However, coupled with the fact that the majority of the girls are in the same 3 poses makes it feel like basically no effort was put into it whatsoever. I counted Three of the girls in pose 1, Three of the girls in pose 2, and Two of the girls in pose 3. Which leaves only two girls who have a completely unique pose out of the 10 girls on offer. This to me feels very sloppy.

All in all, I'd say this game is baerly worth the money at it's sale price. If you are going to get this game I'd recommend waiting for it to go on sale, because it's absolutely not worth its original price.

I like this game so much.
Yes, it is cheap, but it has very good quality.
It has retro arts and the girls are drawn fantastically.
Combined with great soundtrack, it makes me feel like I play 80's arcade cabinet.

The weapon upgrade and the bomb (called as Special in this game) are a bit limited, but still the variation can bring enjoyment while you shoot down the enemies.
The way how to use Special is simple; destroys the enemies and collects the stars in order to fill the Special bar.

The level design is pretty good; starts with easy setup to let new players adapt with the environment and the difficulty level is increased time by time. There are 3 difficulties (EASY, NORMAL, and HARD), but there is an extra "difficulty" in this game; how you maintain the girls' cloth in order to get a photo as you wished. It gave me a lot of time to take all girls' photo with full cloth (0% damage).

Quite short, but it is really fun. Hope for more features and or sequel for this game.

Very recommended to choose your own waifu and waste your time with her.

Al momento ci ho giocato solo 20 minuti, ma posso già dirvi che questo gioco è bellissimo! E' uno sparatutto verticale retro dove devi anche sparare ai vestiti delle ragazze con l'obbiettivo di spogliarle; praticamente è un remake di quel fantastico gioco del 2001 chiamato "Sentimental Shooting" (doujin game tratto dall'ancor più vecchio dating sim "Sentimental Graffiti" del 1998), ma il tutto viene condito da un'atmosfera retro synth wave anni 80 che non guasta. 
Quindi. Bella colonna sonora, gameplay divertente e veloce, funziona con il controller xbox one, prezzo regalato, conclusione: must have.

EDIT: dura poco, ma in modalità hard il gioco diventa, appunto, davvero difficile.

Ok, so I haven't played too much of this (maybe 20 mins so far). What I can say is: good art, interesting premise, nice, chill soundtrack. I'm the 20 or so mins I played I already finished three of the girls... so if there's only 10 then this will be a really short game. (It's a shmup tho, so what were you expecting?)
A few cons I've found thus far... I enemy layouts seem to be very VERY similar level to level, so much so it seems like you're repeating the some "level" over and over only with a different picture and stage boss that's changed. The second and third girls' pictures seemed almost reused. Same pose, just different face and clothes on top. **after playing longer, a lot of the pictures seemed like reskins. Same poses, just a different face or clothes**

Even with the cons I've found so far I do recommend this game. Just seems like it coulda used "another pass on level three"
 (i.e. a little more polish). 

Like I said before... In the end it's quick, it's good fun, and I'm loving the soundtrack. While it could use a little more polish, if you go in knowing that you're going to "get what you pay for" then you'll be fine. That's not meant to disparage the game, by the way. I mean hell, I've bought worse games fopr $1.99 ($1.39 at the time of this review). 

[strike]Most of you will be buying it for the tig 'ol biddies anyway...[/strike] Just go ahead and buy it already! :p

32246207.review:
[b][h1]Review update for the HD update:[/h1][/b]

Impressive. The latest update, which I had an eye on since it was announced a week or so ago, fixes pretty much every beef I had with the game on launch.

The girls look way better. The line art didn't change much, but didn't have to. The colouring however, is very much improved now. The overall fidelity is on par what you can expect from a retro-style game these days, without being held back by ancient nonexistent limitations anymore. 

The menu shaking is turned almost all the way down to a very tolerable level. The HUD and menues were reworked. There's a lot more content, too. More girls, Gentleman Mode (which I yet have to check out).

The music is still great. The writing didn't change much, for all I can tell, so eh. Nor did the Barbie nakedness, though it looks better now, for what it's worth - and apparently there's fixes for that. 

Most importantly, in the end, the gameplay is still classic arcade'y just like I was looking for in the first place.

So yes. For 2 bucks? Now I can recommend it wholeheartedly.

--------------------------------------

[b][h1]Old review, for completion sake:[/h1][/b]

[spoiler]Okay. Classic adult arcade fun gameplay with absurd premise, cool theme and catchy music? Sounds great, right?

In Theory, it is.

This game however, manages to fuck it all up either by not knowing that style should never get in the way of usability, or simply the lack of actual talent and effort.

The menu is constantly shaking and giving me a headache. The visuals, pixelated, try to cater to a certain retro style, but just look shoddy and lazy. The girls are of course just as much of a pixel mess, but on top of that are zoomed in enough to see the bad cropwork. Backgrounds are nonexistent for the most part. And to add to that, whoever coloured all of this didn't bother putting more than absolutely necessary into it either, drawing outside of the lines like a kindergartener would. I don't even care about that none of the writing makes the girls seem in any way likeable. 

All in all, frustrating, ugly, lazy, disappointing. Oh, and concerning the last attribute? You're uncovering barbie dolls. Yeah. And they even thought you'd want to screenshot the end results for whatever reason.

If anything would desperately need a HD remaster, then it is this game first and foremost.

Only the very low price point keeps me from even bothering with a refund. You get what you pay for with it - a brief chuckle and a sigh. Don't expect anything more. Oh, and if you want to see anime girls naked, there's google for that. For free.[/spoiler]

32225381.review:
So I was looking around for a casual arcade-style game to waste some time on and I found this one on sale for a dollar. I decided to not look at any of the previews or reviews and go in blind. Oooh boy was I surprised when I got in...

That being said, as somebody who hasn't played any bullet hell games before (not counting Undertale), this really was the time-waster game I was looking for. The levels are challenging enough to keep me focused, but not infuriatingly difficult to the point of being unfun (Is that a word?). Having to aim at specific parts of the map is a unique concept that, to my limited knowldege, isn't present in many other bullet hell games and having two different objectives (collecting stars and blasting off clothes) keeps it fresh, offering level replayablity that many other arcade-style games I've tried before lack.

While the overall... umm... aesthetic of the game does make me slightly uncomfortable, it is still an great choice to pull out when I have time to kill.

32194254.review:
Unity製シューティング版脱衣ブロック崩しです。
敵をさばきながら衣服に表示されるポイントにショットを撃ち込み脱がしていきます。
下着を脱がしても局部は見えません。(そもそも描かれていない、リカちゃん人形です)

難易度
攻撃はゆるく、残機は4もあり、最終面でもそんなに難しくはありません。(脱衣メインなのであんまり難しくされても...)
普段からシューティングをやっている人なら全ステージノーミス100%脱衣星コンプ実績コンプは簡単かと思われます。

良かった点
ネオンライトやダンスフロアのような色使いやBGMから、全体的に80年代を彷彿とさせるような雰囲気が出ていて良い。
キャラクターの髪に撃ち込むと髪が揺れる、目がうるうるするなど細かい。
ステージセレクトのキャラ紹介が非常に個性的で読んでいて面白い。

悪かった、気になる点
ステージ選択のUIが非常に分かりずらい。どのステージを選択しているのか分かりづらくストレスを感じる。
破壊できるポイントが撃ち込んでみないと表示されないため、総当たりで撃ってみないと分からない。
敵を倒すと出てくる星を入手時にしかスコアが入らないので、敵の撃破時や撃ち込み点、脱衣時でもスコアが増えるようにしてほしかった。
アイテムと敵弾が重なるとアイテムのほうが上に描画されることがあり。事故が発生しやすい。
二種類あるボムのうち。敵弾をスローにする方のボムが弱い。
キャラクターの約半分が服を変えたりしただけの差分絵になっている。(破壊ポイントやボスは変わっているので難易度は異なる)

攻略のコツ
下着などボス戦に入らないと破壊ポイントが発生しない部分があるので、道中で全脱がしは不可能。
靴下などはボス戦に入ると画面が足まで移動しなくなり破壊不可能になるので優先的に破壊する。
次のステージのアンロックに必要な星は敵を倒すと出てくる紫の星を集めると入手できる(1ステージ5個まで)。中ボスが特に多く落とすので逃がさないようにする。

不具合
ウィンドウモードを選択し画面サイズを変更すると、画面サイズが最大値に固定され、画面の下が見切れることがあった。
フルスクリーン起動では発生しなかったため、同様の不具合が出る場合はフルスクリーンを推奨。

その他
[spoiler] 1回100%脱衣を成功させると片手モードで遊べるようになります。実績から空いた手で片方の手でアレをしろという事が察せるけど流石に弾避けしながらアレをするのはちょっと... [/spoiler]

32175491.review:
If you think Deep Space Waifu is another game that tries to sell itself with sexual themes and nude women, you'd be god damn right. But there's actually more to it than that, shocking I know.

GAMEPLAY 7/10: It's your traditional arcade style retro bullet hell game on the surface, and it honestly doesn't do much to break out of that, though there are a few things. First of all, you have two objectives in each level, kill enemies (and collect their stars) to earn points (and fuel your special ability), and shoot vital areas on the women's clothing in order to make the particular piece of clothing vulnerable, then blow it off. The first objective is very traditional, but the sub-objective of shooting off the clothing is a little unique. You fire three lines of lasers, for each vitual area in front of your shots, one line of lasers will be absorbed to deal damage to it, that means your shots are often partially or completely blocked from hitting enemies, and so positioning is important. Another thing is that once an article of clothing is completely blown off, all shots on screen are dispersed, and so this mechanic can be used tactically to provide breathing room in tight situations. Lastly, you're able to decide your ship's speed on your own from level to level, instead of having to get pick ups throughout the levels.

ART 5/10: It's mediocre at best, sometimes shots will drown in the stars and background because of the similar colours, which is a bit annoying, but not that big of a deal. As for the girls themselves, which make for the backdrop of the levels, they seem low resolution and not that impressive, many of them are also very similar, which is a bit sad. The artist(s) behind the game could have taken a bit of inspiration from Hunnie Pop and Negligee, but it's not that big of a deal for a 2 euro game.

MUSIC 9/10: Here's what carries the game. Without the music, I definitely wouldn't even have considered buying the game. The music is extremely relaxing and fitting. If you don't like the music, don't bother with the game, because you won't enjoy it, the music is a massive part of the experience.

TL;DR 7/10: It's a fun game, about 1-3 hours worth of gameplay depending on how much of a completionist you are, and how good you are at bullet hell games. I bought it with a 30 % discount and scrounged the money together by just selling a few trading cards on the market, and I gotta say, totally worth it, no regrets.

32173599.review:
DEEP SPACE WAIFU (The store page has the title in all caps) is a blatant clone of Sentimental Shooting, a very old Japanese shoot 'em up where your objective was to pilot a ship along waves of enemies and bosses to... Shoot a girl's clothing off. Yeah, it was that kind of game. And this is also that kind of game.

Overall, it doesn't innovate much over its inspiration. You just fly around and fire at the enemies and the clothes of the girl in the background, which work kind of like ground targets in other shmups. From time to time, powerups show up that equip your ship with turrets: Either rockets that do extra damage but only fire forwards or laser beams that are weaker but aim at where the enemies are. When you kill enemies, they drop stars that you can pickup that will do two things: Charging a special attack and increasing your score. And unlike in Sentimental Shooting, score is important. Scoring high is what upgrades your star rating at the end of the level, and the higher your rating is, the more girls you unlock. Also, when you manage to clear a girl's stage, you can unlock One-Handed Mode, which makes the ship shoot automatically so that you only have to steer it, which can be done with, you guessed it, one hand. When you clear a stage, you can also take a snapshot of the girl to use it as a midnight snack. That said, even when you manage to destroy all of a girl's clothing, all you see is Barbie Doll Anatomy [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=937146946]unless you do a little trick with the game's files.[/url] It's not a very hard game, in around two hours, you should have unlocked and cleared all girls if you are not a complete lost cause at playing shmups.

The graphic department is pretty nice. The aesthetic is full of neon lights and vibrant colors. There are no graphic bugs that I have seen while playing, and there was no slowdown at any point during the game, which I'm grateful for. That said, while the girls have different clothes and physiques, the devs seem to have recycled the same 3-4 poses for all of them. A bit more variety would be welcome!

Sounds-wise, it's nothing to call home for, but it does its job alright. The soundtrack is composed of vaporwave tunes that compliment the neon aesthetic. There are very few tracks, tho, so don't expect one tune for every girl, like in Sentimental Shooting.

The price is also worth mentioning. This game normally costs 2 Euros, and even less during sales. I managed to get that money by selling trading cards.

Overall, if you have some money itching in your wallet, this is something you can spend it on if you like simple shoot 'em ups and are a huge pervert.

PROTIP: You should also get the Academy expansion. It's well worth the money.

32171960.review:
ちょっぴりレトロチックな脱衣シューティング。
全体的に難易度はヌルめで、筆者は2時間ほどで全実績解除。
上手い人ならもっと早いと思います。

登場キャラ数はゲーム概要にも記載されているとおり10人（※）
（※レビュー記載当時。現在はアップデートやDLCの登場等で人数増）
但し一部コンパチキャラも存在しているため、
全体のボリュームなんかも含め、この辺は賛否が分かれる
部分かもしれません。
（元々の価格を考慮すると個人的には全然アリですが）

【良い点】
・日本語対応
　少々怪しい感じが漂ってますが
　コレはコレで味があって良いです。

・自機スピードの調節が可能
　ステージ開始前だけでなく、ポーズ中でも設定変更できます。

・敵が硬すぎず、道中さほど退屈しない
　爽快感もそこそこアリ。

・特定の条件を満たす事でワンハンドモードが選択可能に
　ショットボタンを押す指を労ってくれる親切設計。優しい。
　そもそもオート連射効いてるから別に疲れないとか
　何に使うモードなのかとか左利きの人はどうすればとか
　色々謎は残りますが、お察しください。

・謎のパッチの存在
　他の方のレビューやコミュニティにて言及されています。
　先述のワンハンドモードと相性抜群？
　筆者には一体何のことかサッパリですが、この辺はお好みで。

・眼鏡キャラの眼鏡が壊れない
　作者は分かってる。

【悪い点】
・ボス含め、敵の種類が乏しい
　☆集めを目的にでもしていない限りは
　基本服ばかりを狙うジェントルマンシューターと化すため
　敵なんてほぼ眼中に無いんですが、でもちょっと寂しい。
　
・敵弾が見辛い
　服や身体ばっかり見てるせい？
　いやいやそんなことは無い　…はず。

・コントローラ周りの設定項目不足（デッドゾーン設定が無い）（※本レビュー下部に追記あり）
　箱コンを使用すると自機移動はアナログスティックのみで
　十字キーが使えません。
　さらに困ったことにデッドゾーン皆無なため、
　ほんの僅かな傾きを検知した時点で自機が勝手に
　移動してしまい、ニュートラルに戻して思い通りの位置に
　ピタッと止めるのが少々困難になっています。
　
・スクショが上書きされる（※本レビュー下部に追記あり）
　ステージクリア時に女の子の姿が自動的にスクショとして
　ゲーム内フォルダに保存されるのですが、有無を言わさず
　上書きされるため、折角「わざとタイツだけ残してクリア」
　などといった紳士的な記録を残しても、
　次回普通に全部ひん剥いてクリアしてしまうと
　そっちの画像で上書きされてしまいます。
　孫の代まで家宝にしたいものはリネームなりコピーするなりしましょう。
　
【総評】
全体的にヌルくガチシューター向けではない、
一部コンパチキャラがいる等ボリューム面も
少々物足りなさが否めない、などなど賛否分かれる部分が
あるものの、気軽に肩の力を抜いて敵や衣服を破壊しながら
目の保養＆暇つぶしが出来るゲーム、と捉えると
価格の安さも手伝って決して悪くない作品だと思います。オススメ。

【2017/11/05追記】
先日のハロウィンセールにてDLCを購入＆久々にプレイ。
アップデートによって【悪い点】に記載した

・コントローラのデッドゾーン設定
・スクショの上書き可否

上記2点について改善されている事を確認。
そのほか、グラフィックのHD化（旧グラはレトロモードへ移行）など
痒いところにしっかりと手が届いた印象。

這是像素風格的射擊遊戲，雖然用成人情色來包裝 (額外福利請自行到該遊戲的討論區看)，但彈幕射擊的部分一點都不馬虎，攻擊、閃避的技巧還是很重要的，不經過一番琢磨，想無腦攻略通關是不可能的。
玩家要一方面閃避來襲的敵機及重重彈幕，一方面提升火力和收集戰利品，一方面也要逐步破壞攻略目標的各部位防禦力，盡量在過關時得到更高的評等，才能解鎖更多關卡。
各個關卡完成100%攻略後的能解開「片手模式」 (全自動射擊)，有另一番趣味。
整體難度而言，約四小時的磨練，一般玩家都能全成就吧。
經過連續幾日的更新，按鍵和圖示不一樣已經改進；延遲問題經過unity內建的調整選項也都能改善。整體而言是誠意滿滿、物美價廉的小品，不論折扣與否都值得入手。

32144512.review:
If you're reading this review, you already know what this game is all about, but here is my review anyway.

Deep Space Waifu is a classical shoot'em up where you shoot 2 things : enemies, and the clothes of the anime girl in the background. It resembles a lot the old Sentimental Shooting game, but improved in many ways. (And there's an adult patch in the discussion forum)

Killing enemies make them drop items that you collect to earn points, and the more points you have the more you get stars (up to 5 per level) that will be needed to unlock the next girl/stage.
Shooting clothes makes them drop so that the girl gets more and more naked and you also at the same time if you are doing this right (there is even a one hand mode with auto-shooting, yeah !)

All in all, it is a short game that will not be too hard if you are used to bullet hell shmups, but can be a little bit challenging if you want to complete it perfectly (all 5 stars, all girls unlocked and cleared in both normal and one hand mode). It took me around 2 hours to complete it 100%, which is short, but as it is a 1 dollar game, I won't complain.

I really had a good time playing this game, with the dreamy like soundtrack and the hotline miami kind of graphics, and of course the pretty waifus.

Another good thing to mention is that the game dev is very active to reply on the forum and to fix any bug. He also mentionned that additional content will be added to the game, which is always a good thing.

10/10 would waifu again

15-16 years ago I played a game called Sentimental Shooting that I found hilarious, an easy and mediocre shooter where you played a tiny pilot that shot off a girl's clothing while fending off other tiny robots/whatever.  Considering this game is like that one in both concept and mediocre gameplay I'd bet money that the dev has played it as well.  Thumbs up for the ridiculous nostalgia factor and the fact that it is a playable but average pick-up-and-play shooter.

As mentioned above it is not a mind blowing experience so if you like shooters for a challenge it's probably not going to be your thing.  There are no nipples or genitalia (unless there is some unlockable I don't know about), so if you are looking for a porn game you will probably want to look elsewhere.

The only big negative is that the control scheme shown in the game for controllers is wrong, at least if you are using an Xbone controller.  It's not that hard to figure out though.

32142174.review:
As someone who typically isn't too fond of Bullet Hell games, this game I find preety enjoyable. Compared to the big name bullet hells such as the touhou series, Deep Space Waifu's difficulty definitly dosen't compete. I'd say if you arn't familiar with Bullet Hells or just don't care for the usual difficulty of one than this game is for you. It equals the perfect difficulty for bullet hell noobies but not too easy for the touhou veterens. The music and aesthetic of the game is also rather pleasing. I myself love the 1980's vaporwave aesthetic and so I love that little touch to the game. I'd say my only complaint is the art work. The artwork isn't terrible but it's no where close too amazing. I'd say the anime girls in the game are drawn slightly above a newgrounds animation quality. If that dosen't bother you then I highly reccomend this game. For a cheap a price and an 18+ Patch you can add, this game is a good time

Edit: As of today I purchased the DLC and have touched the game for the first time since my original purchase. I have to say I am highly impressed. The updated art is very nice and is is high quality compared to the original product when first released. The updated overlay is also very appealing as it is easier to navigate the menu. I also love the new addition of mini bosses. This game has improved greatly since my original review and I highly reccomend it still along with the new DLC which adds plenty of quality content for only 99cents.

32111271.review:
The short review : 

+Fun, it's a bullethell shmup, if you like overcoming the odds with your skill, you'll like this
+Lot's of waifus i guess.
+The music is alright, tho', a bit calming which contradicts all the shootymcshooty but, i guess it works for the whole stripping thing.
-controls are kinda weird? like, the ship sometimes slings itself at a fast speed, and sometimes it dosent.
- Stars makes some bullets invisible, honestly the bullets could be shinier and stick out more.

Overall, good and fun.

The long Review/critic : 

I bought this on a whim, i wanted a shmup, this was cheap.
 
So, first off, the art, while well drawn, some of them, or most, have this ''blurry'' thing to their lines which makes me think they where resized sprites, and, well, it dosen't look as good as it could because of it, which is a shame i like how your shots make the ladies hair flow, or skirt, or whatever, there was a hardwork there, and the art IS good, but the technical aspect of it leaves to be desired, i'm not sure what happened.

There's not much to say since it's pretty short and kinda simple, but, its a fun shmup, what i do have to say is the potential for a sequel here.

The way i see, this can be expanded to a kinda of a dating sim, were you'r super-futuristic character dates girls, gift them, work, pimp their motorcycle to make it better, just, a simple progression thing, plus it'd give the girls some personality.

The whole shooting clothes could be expanded too, instead of the camera going wherever it wants, you could make it slightly twin-sticky, with one you move the background around (could be used to dodge bullets too) and the other you move the ship as always. Maybe that would expand the system of bullets disappearing once the clothes come off, so someone could weak every part of the clothes, to make the boss easy, if they know what their doing.
The bosses could be rivals, with a bit of personality too.
Maybe points could be converted into money to buy presents for the ladies, heck, a difficult system could be linked to clothes, the sexier and fancy the clothes are, the more layered it is, the more enemies there is, and said clothes are expensive so you gotta grind money up!

And well, i mean, those are ideas, i'm not a programmer, but as it is, its a fun little game, and despite some glitches (this one time the game over screen wouldnt disappear even tho' i had reseted the stage, or enemies didnt appear, or bosses didnt have healthbars) it's pretty fun.

Ps. Hey kiddos with jokes of ''man this is embarassing if someone sees me playing it'', so what? just own it, it's your life, i like anime girls, i find them cute, tbh their cuter with some clothes on, but f it. Tbh i'd be worried if my GF saw me playing it, but hey...fuck.

32095950.review:
Casual shmup meets waifu fantasy, in a Hotline Miami-style universe. Not enough gameplay variety [strike]and several minor bugs[/strike], but nice presentation and low price.

[i](Edit: The dev has been great about fixing reported issues.)[/i]

Heavily inspired by While's 2001 PC game [url=https://youtu.be/dONyfvCob3Q?t=20]Sentimental Shooting[/url]. There are two objectives in each stage - shoot down ships to gain score and unlock more stages, and break apart the girls' clothing piece by piece.

The artwork is censored by default, but there is a [url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/639790/discussions/0/1291817837616272221/]quick fix[/url] available, which worked for me.


The best part about the game is the overall art style and presentation. Although it's derivative of Hotline Miami, it works well here and creates a pleasant, dreamy atmosphere which fits the mood of the game nicely. There are also some cool animation details - I liked the way the girls' hair flutters when shot by the player's ship, for example. I wish there were more of that. 

There are English and Japanese language options, but the voice samples are all in English. The voices are not unique for each girl (just one for all of them) which is disappointing, but since they don't say much it wasn't a big deal for me.

On the plus side, the English translation is pretty good. This is seen in the Tinder-like profiles for each girl in the menu. They are brief but well-written and funny.

There's not much music - only 3 or 4 tracks total I think - but it's high-quality stuff. It would be a nice bonus to have these songs available outside the game, if possible.


The actual gameplay is mediocre at best. Shmup veterans will not be satisfied - it's too easy and the mechanics are too simplistic. There's almost no variety and only about 10 enemies total through the whole game, including bosses.

[strike]There are also a lot of little graphical bugs that I encountered - corrupted stage backgrounds and misaligned sprites and such. The game will need a patch or two.[/strike]

[i](Edit: Not anymore.)[/i]

Controller support is okay, although you can't pause the game with the controller - you have to hit ESC on the keyboard. I'm using a Dual Shock 4 so maybe XBox gamepad owners won't have this problem.

In any case, the keyboard and mouse controls work fine (the mouse can only be used for firing, not ship movement).


There are Steam achievements but no leaderboards. Normally leaderboards should be a requirement for any shmup on Steam, but in this case it wouldn't do much good because the scoring is too basic for it to matter.

It will not take long to get 100% of the achievements if that matters to you. It took me just shy of 3 hours to unlock all of them, and that included a profile reset about half way through. For most players it should take a little over 2 hours.


So then, weak gameplay but I still liked it overall. There aren't many other sexy shmups like this available, at least not on Steam. The only other one I know of is [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/502300/Heartomics_Lost_Count/]Heartomics[/url] which I haven't played yet.

The uniqueness and the $2 price are ultimately why I think this is worth picking up. I hope it sells well enough that the devs consider a more ambitious sequel, with greater complexity and an expanded story.

39331426.review:
[h1]脱衣シューティングゲーム[/h1]

まずはじめに，どの点から見ても[b]お値段以上の価値があります。オススメです。[/b]

まずオープニングからすばらしい。
幾多にも及ぶゲームをプレイしてきましたがたいていのゲームは起動時に流れるロゴやイントロムービーがクソで最初は感動するものでも２回目以降は環境設定からスキップするか別のことをして終わるまで時間を潰すかの意味のない時間を過ごさせられてきました。
しかしこれは違います。もうなんていうか…そう、シームレスなのです。そしてストレスレスにゲームを始める事ができます。

UIやゲーム以外での操作性も独特で世界観が良く出ていながら不自由を感じることのない素晴らしい造りになっていると思うのです。

[h1]それでは肝心のシューティングゲーム部分はどうなっているのか？[/h1]

素晴らしいと思います。この値段帯のゲームでは敵の攻撃も種類のワンパターンで味気ないただの作業ゲーに近い造りになってしまうことが多いのですが今作はシューティングゲームの基本要素を満たしていると感じます。難易度変更も出来ますしスペシャルボムや追尾弾，ランダム弾などシューティングゲームしているな感をしっかり感じることが出来ます。
それでもそれだけでは高評価にはつながらないでしょう。しかし，今作の特徴でもある[b]『脱衣』[/b]要素がこのゲームにある程度の戦略性をもたらして深みを付け加えるエッセンスになっているのです。
Characterを脱がす為には敵であるエイリアンを倒す他に衣服に対してダメージを与える必要があります。そしてその部位を中心に必ず画面の焦点が合う訳でもありませんし敵の弾も飛んできます。そこでプレイヤーは『服を脱がすために敵の攻撃に対してリスクを取る』選択や『あえて攻撃せずに回避に徹して脱衣ポイントへ自機が移動するまでまつ』選択などをとる必要も出てきます。
そうなってくるとただ敵の弾を避けて相手を打ち倒すゲームとは行かなくなります。

[h1]ゲーム内の設定や世界観が好き[/h1]

レトロゲームちっくな世界観に女の子の設定もわりと細かくちょっと日本語訳は怪しいのですがそれぞれの女の子のコメントだったり紹介だったりハッシュタグだったりがよくつくりこまれていてその部分も楽しめると思います。
たいていの属性に対応していると思います。[b]ヤンデレ好きな私も満足できました[/b]


[h1]多くの性的倒錯に対応[/h1]

まず貧乳好きの方には申し訳ないのですが今作ではあまり楽しむことができません。別にスピンオフ作品として貧乳をテーマにしたものが発売されていますのでそちらをお楽しみください。
[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/639780/deep_space_waifu_FLAT_JUSTICE_VERSION/]deep space waifu: FLAT JUSTICE VERSION[/url]

最初，私はこのゲームに不満を抱えていました。[b]なぜなら私は全裸よりも一部服を身に着けている方が好きだからです。[/b]

これは戦争が起きるほどの重大テーマでアニマルビデオでもフェチものなのに最後には服を全部脱がして行為に及んでいる為にクソ作品判定をうけるものがあるほどです。

ですが気付いてしまったのです…そう，服の判定は複数あってどの部位を破壊するかはプレイヤーの裁量次第の部分があります。
そうして私は靴下を残して全脱ぎさせることに成功したのです。人類は偉業をまたひとつ成し遂げてしまいました。

[h1]まだ残る課題[/h1]

下着をつけないでコート１枚だけとかなかなかに人口がいると思うのですがシューティングゲームの性質上もあって順番に破壊されて行ってしまうのです。
つまりまだ未対応の性癖もあるわけでぜひとも続編で解決して欲しいと思うのです。

[h1]結局おすすめできるの？[/h1]

HLシリーズやポータルシリーズ，Counter StrikeやL4D2やGarry's ModみたいにSteamで遊ぶならマストバイと太鼓判でオススメできるゲームくらいにはオススメできます。お安く値段設定されていますしぜひとも遊んでみてはいかがでしょうか？

39328417.review:
Purely as a time waster, Deep Space Waifu has potential, but it wastes it on terrible gameplay and a baffling array of technical issues.

Firstly, for a game all about the "visuals", the game's textures are fairly blurry at 1080p and the game's levels are marred by a plethora of layering artifacts and visible texture seams.

Secondly, the game has issues keeping up with the action in the later levels, sinking down into the 30s and 40s as far as framerate is concerned, which is simply a no-go for any kind of shmup or bullet hell game.

Finally, the game lacks an interesting array of enemies and level types, and you'll most likely get bored long before you ever unlock the full cast of girls.

As an added note (and this might just be my particular system), I could never get the controller support working.  I have an official Xbox One controller using Microsoft's official drivers, but often the game would stop recognizing input from the thumbsticks.  In addition, navigating the menus with a controller is a mess.  I found the game best controlled with just the mouse.

39317548.review:
Haven't played very much but I feel I know enough about the game to write a review for it.  The game at it's core is similar to other top-down space shooters like that one really old game where you shot the aliens or something.  The gameplay is  okay for a $1.99 game.  The "visuals" are great, there is even a built in nude patch if that's your thing, there are plenty of reviews explaining how to use it so I won't bother explaining it in mine.  

But, the biggest surprise of all is how good the soundtrack is.  It has a lot Hotline Miami vibes, a big retrowave feel.  And again, the besides the giant anime waifus in the background, the visuals are actually very good.  If you are a fan of "vaporwave" aesthetics then this will definitely be something to try out.  

To sum up how I feel about this game here is my final verdict:

Gameplay: 6/10 - It's not very challenging but you can change that by playing "Gentleman Mode" which gives you 3 lives (lowest amount possible) and you aren't allowed to destroy any clothes.  The gameplay is okay enough to not bore you or make you not want to play, but it isn't anything revolutionary or exciting per-say.  I feel I should also mention my thanks for there being a "one-handed" mode in the game.  

Soundtrack: 9/10 - Like I mentioned above, the OST is phenomenal!  My only real complaint would be that there is only like 3 songs I think which makes sense for a 2 dollar game, it just tends to get a bit repetitive after a while depending on how long you play in one session.

Visuals: 10/10 - For this style of game, I honestly can't think of how to improve the visuals.  Each level or waifu is very pleasant to look at and the backdrop has a great vaporwave aesthetic.  I should also reiterate, there is an official nude patch that makes the game much more enjoyable, it's very easy to use. I wish I could say more but there isn't anything else to say about that.

Overall: 8/10 - I'd recommend this game if you are interested in a unique nut session(s) that no other will compare to.  Plus if you end up not liking it for whatever reason, it was only $2.

Achievements are there and really easy to unlock them all. The only thing hard is to get 5 stars 100% cloth destroy rating will unlock this ONE HAND Mode. Which force you to play with one hand on keyboard. (Control precision is now harder to get use to)

9/10 Still haven’t finished all the one hand mode myself but so far I really really enjoyed this simple bullet hell shooter with my Waifu.

Bem, os controles são incriveis e bem-feitos, podendo alterar a sensibilidade e até jogar com uma mão.

Na jogabilidade eu noto uma boa semelhança a Touhou, a hitbox sendo apenas o centro do personagem, podendo atirar sem parar e tendo um bullet-hell muito legal, porém, é difícil de ver outros projéteis por causa dos seus tiros, que poderiam ter uma opção de opacidade.
Em gráfico, esse jogo é perfeito, especialmente eu, com +100 horas de HuniePop. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
A trilha sonora é de morrer, me senti bem imergido no jogo gráças a isso.

39172912.review:
[h1]熊顔の紳士が銀河を駆ける、「Waifu」探しの旅[/h1]

Flash全盛の頃の脱衣シューティングを彷彿とさせる「紳士達」のための作品。いわゆる弾幕系に相当するものだが、CAVEファンやルナシューターにとっては全く骨がない難易度かもしれない。逆に言えば小生のような弾幕恐怖症患者が最初にとっつくのに向いていると思われる。

熊顔の男「キング・ベア」が銀河全土の女の子（の割に人類しか登録してないが）と出逢えるアプリでイケてる彼女探しをするというぶっ飛んだプロット、ステージはそれぞれの娘とのデートという設定。何故だか女の子がメカニカルな容姿のエイリアンに襲われてるので追っ払う[b]ついでに服を脱がしてあられもない姿を拝む[/b]というのが目的である。肝心のゲーム部分は至ってシンプルな縦シューティング、パワーアップ有り中ボス大ボス有りボム等スペシャル有り、と難しいことは特に無い。
敵のエイリアンは当然だが、女の子の服にも判定と耐久度があり全てのパーツが破れた服を撃ち続ければ脱げる、[b]というか実績目当てなら全員全部ひっぺがす必要があるので容赦なく行こう[/b]。気がつけばcommonファイル内に全裸にされた犠牲者のスクショが溜まってしまうので誰かと共用するPCでのプレイはオススメしかねる。

一部ハンコ絵でポージングが同じかミラーな娘も居るが基本全員描き下ろしなので飽きは来にくい。画風もそこはかとなくバタ臭さがあるものの、HuniePopとかCrush Crushなんかが平気な方なら大丈夫だろう。規制回避のため局部の描写はない。[spoiler]簡単なパッチで局部有りにできてしまうのが恐ろしいところ[/spoiler]
「女性を無理やり脱がすなんてとんでもない！」という高潔な心をお持ちの聖人君子でも楽しめるように「服が破れたら即ゲームオーバー」なガチ紳士モードもある。服の判定が大きいため相当難易度が跳ね上がるが、貴方ならヤれるはず。

下世話でおバカな雰囲気とは裏腹に作り込みはかなりのもの。しっかりした操作感もノリノリなシンセポップBGMもかわいい女の子達も気分をアゲてくれる。[url=store.steampowered.com/app/639780/deep_space_waifu_FLAT_JUSTICE_VERSION/]つるぺた娘しか愛せない方々には特別仕様もある。[/url]黄色い熊のマスクとスマフォを用意したら、いざあなたのWaifu探しの旅へ。

39162606.review:
[h1]A surprisingly good and fun game[/h1]

At first glance this game might looks like one of those brainless money grabs aimed at the casual "weeaboo" (people fond of Japanease culture) demographic, with little to no effort into the gameplay and core mechanics. The kind of games that lure you in with the pictures and end up being discomforting, and a troublesome experience when you evidently refund it in the end.

This assumption was quickly dismissed when I was exposed to what I would consider one of this generations greatest achievement in the genera of Shoot 'em up (shmups for short) with the theme of removing clothing of cute story-rich respectable women.

DEEP SPACE WAIFU (™) is what I would consider a true hidden gem in the vast sea of games you might consider investing in today, and by the end of my review I hope you do too.

[b]Gameplay[/b] - The gameplay features multiple weapon upgrades that really make you feel powerful and give the progression factor to peak the attention of the player. Three vastly different special attacks that help you find the preferred playstyle and heavily impacts the way you see, interact and deal with enemies. The games delightful and smooth animations gives the euphoria that comes with being the total badass you are, blasting through space and saving the damsels in distress. Combine that with amazing sound and the crisp and responsive movement mechanics that I would consider the best I’ve witnessed in my gaming experience makes this game really stand out as a delightful experience. To fully enjoy this game consider investing in a controller if you haven’t already, since playing this game with an analog stick gives a really good sensation due to the freedom of movement in the protagonists vehicle.  This made me never experience deaths due to things I couldn’t avoid with skill and precision, which I highly value in modern games.

[b]Characters[/b] *minor spoilers* – The focus on and detail in the characters is what made me really appreciate the work of art and pure dedication that went into this game. For instance, the yandere girl of the group Yumi Matsuba has many of the famous traits you might remember from previously watched anime or manga. With things like the blank eyes to her blood splatters from doing the deed of securing the attention of her true love. The traits of her being a yandere girl are also shown in the biography before entering the stage; this makes the character really unique from the rest of the cast and gives you the player a feel of what is about to unfold in the stage. Misako Aoyama is another good example of her profession and career being represented in an almost humoristic way in the biography, I will save the details for yourself to experience, but let’s just say she is a secretary. This was the point for me when I had to take a step back to reflect on the attention to detail and dedication to flesh out the characters personalities, which required me to take a second visit to truly absorb. 

[b]Art, Graphics and music[/b] – My assumption of the game was quickly dismissed when I got it up and running. The main menus Vaporwave inspired background combined with the uplifting and enthusiastic tune was a strong foreshadowing of the high production quality I was far from expecting. Honestly a joy to the ear and different tunes are featured with the scaling difficulty that comes with the later stages. There are four different graphics settings, and I highly recommend trying to run it at the highest before compromising. Even my really old computer got unexpected high frames at the best settings so I expect you do too. 

I could go on and on about the elements that really make this game worthwhile your time and money, but sadly steam has a character limit for reviews and I feel like I’ve covered the main points to the best of my ability. Hopefully this review has helped you decide whether to purchase it is the right thing to do, if not at least it has shed a little light on the true depths of what might look like a simple picture game.

There is also a [url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/639790/discussions/0/1291817837616272221/]patch[/url] if you are playing this alone and "over the age of 18" whatever that means ;)

[b]TLDR - Really cheap fun game with amazing quality. You get a lot of bang for your buck. Recommended to people that has an interested in the genera. It is around 2 hours of gameplay with purchasable DLC if you want more levels to blast through.[/b]

39123728.review:
[h1]Recensione semi-seria[/h1]

Codesto videogiuoco è bello. Però ha un poco di problemi:

-L'audio, che è tral'altro la cosa migliore del gioco con le sue musiche anni 80, si bugga da fare schifo. Talvolta, a sua discrezione, decide di lasciarci nel silenzio più assoluto. Altre volte ancora, anche se noi non lo desideriamo, decide di sovrapporre le sue diciture una sopra l'altra, andando a formare delle frasi sconnesse (es° Go! Are you ready?)

-La grafica, la quale mi interessava per riempire le mie solitarie notti avvolto nella noia, è discretamente deludente; in quanto nella durata delle mie 4 e passa ore di giuoco ho solamente intravisto un capezzolo. Non per questo, però, ho mancato di toccarmi soavemente.

-Il gameplay, del quale mi interessava poco o niente, è quello che mi aspettavo: una [b]CIOFECA[/b]. Tuttavia la sua formula innovativa, che va a dare nuova luce a quei giochini flash anni 2004 su siti poco raccomandabili, è varia in quanto possiamo decidere se essere stupratori, pacifisti o cacciatori di tesori.

In più oltre ai bug dell'audio, ci sono dei menù strani e diversi bug durante l'utilizzo di un controller. Inoltre, la totale assenza di trap, decreta questo gioco come maschilista.

[h1]Consiglio questo gioco?[/h1]
Beh, a dirla tutta, se aprite un sito del quale non vi sto a raccontare, potrete trovare più giovamento e perché no, riuscire nei vostri intenti maliziosi con più fantasia. Il gioco è prettamente banale ma ricco di tante belle ragazze che vi terranno compagnia per simulare una vita che non avrete mai...

Il mio voto è:
[b]6-[/b]
Da comprare solo se avete già esplorato tutto l'internette. Magari pijatelo scontato, che così risparmiate.
[i]:)[/i]

39054289.review:
I bought this game because Spotify dropped one of the songs from the soundtrack in my discover weekly and I was intrigued. For $13 I'm incredibly pleased. I've avoided rogue likes since I sunk 400+ hours into rogue legacy. This looks to be another infinite time suck. The mechanics are simple and easy to get used to. Using a controller is awful in my experience. I've tried a steam controller, ps4 and Xbox and all were way too sensitive. Mouse and keyboard are the way to go. 

In regards to the menu though, it leaves a bit to be desired. Sensitivities and other minor tweaks are missing, no resolution control, and you have to manually toggle controller support. The visuals are good for the art style, but I wish I could have full 2560x1080 resolution without a significant amount of the screen taken up by a background/bars. 

Progression is easy enough for the first few stages and as you level you get to pick from 3 random 'mutations' or perks. These can be incredibly useful or complete garbage. It does add some more depth and replay value though. The different characters you unlock as you go are nice, but feel a bit lacking compared to fish, the default. This could just be a playstyle preference though. The roll is pretty great IMO. Have not had the opportunity to try out co-op yet, but I will update this when I have explored more of the game. 

Overall, 8/10 would buy again.

39427613.review:
Story: 10/10
   Very deep story that holds you very deep. Very difficult to put down once you pick it up.
Animation: 10/10
   Top quality animation. If it isn't hand drawn it is done by a master.
Gameplay: 9/10
   Captivating, fun, and intense. Had a couple downsides with the loading screen times, but were still very quick.
Controls: 10/10
   Very easy and adaptable controls, for both keyboard and controller. One-handed mode makes it even better.
Graphics: 10/10
   The highest setting of graphics are amazing and very realistic. Capable of handling on any computer, almost no need of the other options.
Soundtrack: 9/10
   Amazing soundtrack, yet subtle. Amazing filler for the few quiet points, and adds the extra oomph to the player to keep playing. Just beaten by other games, though very close.
Enemies: 8/10
   Many great enemies, my personal favourite being the large shirt guy, being difficult but gives a joyous feeling when 
   defeated. My only hope is for some new enemies, but that shouldn't be too far away.
Bugs or Glitches: 10/10
   Few to no bugs or glitches to be found as of yet. If there are, they are very subtle and unnoticable.
Free "DLC": 9/10
   The free DLC by adding nude.patch to the files makes this even better. Can be weird at first, but definitely improves overall gameplay.
DLC: 10/10
   The paid DLC for the game is amazing for just $3 dollars. Adds hours of new content and fun. "If DLC was always this good, EA would be my favourite company" - Jason "videogamedunkey" Gastrow.

Overall, I give this game a 10/10. Fun from the beginning to the end with hours of fun and straight to the point.

39478254.review:
Обзор на эту игру дается очень тяжело, но это то что должно быть сделано. Я отдаю себе отчет о том насколько опасна данная работа, сколько людей умерло или было покалечено в процессе написания подобных вещей, но это не может остановить меня в моем пути. Именно Вайфу из Глубокого Космоса показали главные вещи в жизни любого мужчины. Это то что осветило мою жизнь, дало смысл существования, проникло в самые глубокие уголки моей души.

Данная игра учит любого человека то как быть настоящим мужиком. Надежным, крепким как горы и скалы, способным на любые поступки и свершения. Жизнь мужика никогда не была хороша, но именно эта игра позволяет взлянуть на неё под совершенно новым углом, переосмыслить базовые вещи и идти дальше.

В ходе прохождения данной игры игрок должен быть смел, отважен и хитер. Прямо как в сексе. Необходимо постоянно совершать множество тактических и стратегические решения от которых зависит твоя жизнь. Прямо как в сексе. Решительность и самостоятельность, гибкий ум и принципиальность, отвага и верность, двойной чизбургер и стандартная кола. Прямо как в сексе. 

Очень сложно подобрать нужные слова чтобы передать в двух словах что именно нужно делать в этой игре, как не сказать лишнего, как не опошлить, но передать всю глубину замысла и задумки данной игры. Необходимо решится и сделать это.

Это игра про то как на мужик в маске медведя летает на мотоцикле вокруг тёлочек, развевает их своими пушками, а потом фоткает на смартфон.
